Aberlour 12 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: This 12-year-old expression is a fine example of how the distinctively crisp, citrus character of Aberlour's raw spirit is deftly softened by double cask maturation. Traditional oak and seasoned sherry butts are both used to great effect, as the mellowed spirits within are combined to deliver a subtly balanced flavor.

fields.name: Aberlour Abunadh Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: Meaning ‘the original’ in Gaelic, A’bunadh is made in homage to Aberlour’s founder, James Fleming, using only traditional methods without chill filtration or other modern processes. Made in tribute to an 1898 bottle of Scotch, each bottle carries a unique batch number, released in limited-run batches. With orange, black cherries, dried fruit and ginger, this robust and long lasting scotch has bittersweet notes of exotic spices, dark chocolate and oak.

fields.name: Tomatin Scotch Whisky Dualchas
fields.description: Time in Bourbon barrels and Virgin Oak casks brings a light sweetness to The Tomatin Dualchas, which boasts aromas of vanilla, marshmallow, pineapple and lemon. On the palate gentle flavours of candy, pine, lemon sherbet, apples and sponge cake emerge ahead of a light, clean finish.

fields.name: Aberlour 16 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: With the depth and complexity that comes from being matured for 16 years in a combination of first-filled oak bourbon casks and the finest sherry butts, this expression's warm fruity notes are enriched by an engagingly spicy sweetness. Aberlour 16 Year has a creamy nose with sweet raisin aromas and a spicy nuttiness; a smooth blend of floral and spicy flavors, paired with a sweet plum fruitiness and gentle oakiness on the palate; and a gloriously long finish, with a warm, honeyed spiciness.

fields.name: The Balvenie Doublewood 12 Year Scotch
fields.description: The Balvenie DoubleWood is a twelve year old single malt which gains its distinctive character from being matured in two wood types. Over the period of maturation it is transferred from a traditional oak whisky cask to a first fill European oak sherry cask. Each stage lends different qualities to the resulting smooth single malt. Cinnamon and tangy fruit mingle for a complex flavor profile with peppery, milk chocolate undertones.

fields.name: Chivas Regal 12 Year Scotch
fields.description: Chivas is a blend of many different malt and grain Scotch whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend balances flavorful styles of wild herbs, heather and honey with substance and tradition and a modern twist. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 12 bottles

fields.name: Chivas Regal 12 Year Scotch
fields.description: Chivas is a blend of many different malt and grain Scotch whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend balances flavorful styles of wild herbs, heather and honey with substance and tradition and a modern twist. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 12 bottles

fields.name: Chivas Regal 12 Year Scotch
fields.description: Chivas is a blend of many different malt and grain Scotch whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend balances flavorful styles of wild herbs, heather and honey with substance and tradition and a modern twist. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 12 bottles

fields.name: Chivas Regal 12 Year Scotch
fields.description: Chivas is a blend of many different malt and grain Scotch whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend balances flavorful styles of wild herbs, heather and honey with substance and tradition and a modern twist. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 12 bottles

fields.name: Chivas Regal 12 Year Scotch
fields.description: Chivas is a blend of many different malt and grain Scotch whiskies, matured for at least 12 years. This rich, smooth blend balances flavorful styles of wild herbs, heather and honey with substance and tradition and a modern twist. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 12 bottles

fields.name: Suntory Toki Whiskey
fields.description: Suntory Whisky Toki is a vivid blend of carefully selected whiskies from the House of Suntory's globally acclaimed Hakushu, Yamazaki, and Chita distilleries. The selection of Hakushu American white oak cask, malt whisky, and Chita heavy-type grain whisky as the blend's two pillars overturns the old relationship between malt and grain and creates a blend that is both groundbreaking and timeless. It evokes green grapes, peppermint and thyme, with a subtly sweet and spicy finish with a hint of vanilla oak, white pepper and ginger. Enjoy neat, on the rocks or as a chilled highball, with soda water and a slice of grapefruit.

fields.name: Glenmorangie Signet Scotch
fields.description: A fusion of unique and rare elements, and clouded in secrecy, Signet is the culmination of a lifetime's experience. A blend of Glenmorangie's oldest whiskey—distilled over thirty years ago when malting still occurred on site—and spirit matured in a selection of the world's finest casks. Signet's melting, chocolaty sweetness and explosive spiciness is caused by their unique roasted 'chocolate' barley malt and their designer American white oak casks.

fields.name: Hibiki Harmony Whiskey
fields.description: Hibiki Japanese Harmony Whisky is a harmonious blend of numerous malt and grain whiskies which are meticulously blended to create a full orchestra of flavors and aromas. Seductive, blossoming and enigmatic, Hibiki Whisky celebrates an unrivaled art of blending, fine craftsmanship and a sense of luxury from the House of Suntory. Hibiki was launched in 1989 to commemorate Suntory’s 90th anniversary, and has ever since been embraced as the paragon of the art of Japanese whisky, the very product of Japanese nature and her people. Hibiki Whisky is not only Japan’s most highly awarded blended whisky, but among the most prestigious and honored whiskies in the world.

fields.name: Suntory Yamazaki 12 Year Whisky
fields.description:
Yamazaki 12 Year is a pure gold whisky with an aroma of peach, pineapple, grapefruit, and Mizunara (Japanese oak). Notes of coconut and cranberry are expressed on the fore-palate, while a creamy buttery note of nut oil expresses itself shortly after. It has a long finish, distinguished by flavors of zesty ginger and sweet cinnamon.

Shop additional bourbons.

fields.name: Ardbeg 10 Year Islay Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: Ardbeg Ten Years Old is revered around the world as the peatiest, smokiest, most complex single malt of them all. Yet it does not flaunt the peat; rather it gives way to the natural sweetness of the malt to produce a whisky of perfect balance. Its flavor profile is complex enough for a unique experience every time.

fields.name: Ardbeg An Oa
fields.description: The southern-most point of Islay is the Mull of Oa, the rounded headland that shelters Ardbeg from the wild Atlantic. There the whiskey is married together from several different casks. The result is a smoky, sweet and singularly rounded Islay single malt scotch whiskey.

fields.name: Ardbeg Uigeadall Scotch
fields.description: Ardbeg Uigeadail (pronounced Oog-a-dal) is a special vatting that marries Ardbeg's traditional deep, smoky notes with luscious, raisiny tones of old ex-Sherry casks. This smoky dram with hints of raisin and warm Christmas cake is non chill-filtered at high strength, which retains maximum flavor and gives more body and added depth.

fields.name: Ardbeg Corryvreckan Scotch
fields.description:
Corryvreckan takes its name from the famous whirlpool that lies to the north of Islay, where only the bravest souls dare to venture. Swirling aromas and torrents of deep, peaty, peppery taste lurk beneath the surface of this beautifully balanced dram.

Like the whirlpool itself, Corryvreckan is not for the faint-hearted!

fields.name: Ardbeg Drum
fields.description: In a bottle design reminiscent of Islay’s “Feis Ile Festival,” this special, limited release whisky has been aged in ex-bourbon casks and rested in ex-rum casks to product a downright wondrous paradiddle of aromas. Fragrant pine resin, wood smoke and sea spray dance alongside ripe banana and pineapple. Lavender, licorice and vanilla sway into rich, dark chocolate before parading into a long, smoky finish.

fields.name: Teachers Scotch
fields.description: Teacher's Highland Cream has an exceptionally high malt content of no less than 45 percent, giving this Scotch a richer, more full-bodied flavor. Made with over 30 different single malt whiskies, this complex spirit is best enjoyed with a  little water added to the glass.

fields.name: Black Bottle Blended Scotch
fields.description: Every great story must find its beginning, a spark that shines from the darkness and someone willing to reach beyond the ordinary to clutch it. For those inquisitive souls, the reward is Black Bottle: a dram so curiously rich and delicately smoky, that its family recipe has been shrouded in secrecy for over 130 years.

fields.name: Ballantines Scotch
fields.description: Ballantine's Finest is a complex, refined and elegant blended Scotch whiskey with soft floral notes and a lingering citrus tang. It is regarded as the taste to satisfy a modern style. The brand's light gold color and unmistakable taste come from a complex mix of carefully selected malt and grain whiskies all aged for at least three years, and many much longer.

fields.name: Ballantines Scotch
fields.description: Ballantine's Finest is a complex, refined and elegant blended Scotch whiskey with soft floral notes and a lingering citrus tang. It is regarded as the taste to satisfy a modern style. The brand's light gold color and unmistakable taste come from a complex mix of carefully selected malt and grain whiskies all aged for at least three years, and many much longer.

fields.name: Benriach 10 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: BenRiach 10 Year Single Malt Scotch is a classic Speyside scotch.  This fresh single malt aged in ex-bourbon and ex-sherry casks captures warm oak spices, green apple, dried apricots, peach and banana with subtle touches of aniseed, lemon zest and barley.

fields.name: Glenfiddich Ancient Reserve Single Malt
fields.description: Produced in small batches, Glenfiddich Ancient Reserve combines a touch of sweetness from the Spanish Oloroso wood with oakiness drawn from the traditional American casks. Through marrying in wooden tuns (vast vats), the rich, mellow flavors come together, creating an exceptionally smooth single malt scotch whiskey with notes of spiced apple and robust oak.

fields.name: Kilchoman Machir Bay Scotch
fields.description: The Machir Bay range is Kilchoman’s core expression, first launched in 2012 when it won the prestigious IWSC 2012 Gold Award—Best in Class. Unlike most Kilchoman releases Machir Bay is matured in both Bourbon barrels and Sherry casks affording it a beautiful balance of rich tropical fruit, peat smoke, light vanilla and intense sweetness.

fields.name: Bowmore 12 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: Complex yet perfectly balanced, Bowmore's 12-Year Single Malt Scotch reflects the raw essence of Bowmore—thrashing waves, windswept landscapes and generations of tradition. This Scotch has received much critical acclaim. The late, great whisky writer Michael Jackson proclaimed it "remarkably long and complex."

fields.name: Bruichladdich Port Charlotte 10 Year Scotch
fields.description: Distilled, matured and bottled on the island of Islay, Port Charlotte 10 Year is made with 100% Scottish Barley. This heavily peated scotch is balanced with Bruichladdich's signature floral style and features a BBQ smokiness and sweet malty notes.

fields.name: Bruichladdich Black Art 7
fields.description: Single malt whisky has the unique ability to capture and preserve a snapshot in time. Signifying the end of an era, 1994 was the year Bruichladdich was closed for what could have been the last time. On the palate, oak gives a hint of dryness but also waves of coconut, Turkish delight, soft caramel and spiced orange.

fields.name: Highland Park 30yr Single Malt
fields.description: Highland Park thirty year old is a rich, rewarding and powerful single malt thanks to slow, even maturation in a masterful combination of oak casks for a minimum of thirty years in Orkney’s cool, Northern climate.

fields.name: Glenfiddich Solera Reserve Single Malt
fields.description: Fifteen-year-old Glenfiddich from three types of casks (traditional American bourbon, Portuguese sherry and new oak) is married in a large Solera vat, made of Oregon pine. The vat is always kept at least half full, ensuring a consistent quality of whisky is maintained whenever it is topped up. Then this beautifully balanced single malt is left to settle in a small Solera tun before bottling. The result? A full and fruity nose, with delicate honey and vanilla notes. The taste is elegantly smooth, with a deep flavor that reveals fruit, gentle spice and a touch of oak. The finish is long and satisfying.

fields.name: Bunnahabhain 12 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: With the move to unchill-filtered malt and a higher strength of 46.3 percent ABV, this remarkable twelve year old Scotch has more than earned some new packaging. Hinting at the tales the liquid within has to tell, the label highlights the move to a natural color and an unchill-filtered process. Similarly, the bottle is now presented in a quality gift carton containing a welcoming booklet with information on the brand.

fields.name: Classic Malts Collection Strong Whiskey Pack
fields.description: The Classic Malts Strong Whiskey Pack includes Lagavulin 16 Year, Talisker 10 Year and Cragganmore 12 Year.

fields.name: Auchentoshan Three Wood Scotch
fields.description: This unique Auchentoshan Lowland single malt whiskey has been matured in three different cask types; moving from American bourbon to Spanish Oloroso sherry and finally, Pedro Ximenez sherry casks. Auchentoshan Three Wood is a rich complex whiskey with incredible toffee and sherry oak flavors.

fields.name: Auchentoshan 21 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: Triple distilled and aged perfectly for over twenty one years in American bourbon and Spanish sherry casks. This creates a refined Lowland Single Malt Whisky, ripe with gooseberries, sweet creamy vanilla, a hint of oak, warm honey and the signature smooth, delicate, Auchentoshan taste.

fields.name: Auchentosahn American Oak Scotch
fields.description: This Scotch is tripe distilled and matured solely in American bourbon casks. The result is a Lowland single malt whisky with the sweet aromas of vanilla and coconut, along with the signature smooth, delicate Auchentoshan taste.

fields.name: Glenkinchie 12 Year Scotch
fields.description: A light, sweet nose with fresh, slightly sweet flavours of grass, fruits and malt giving way to an intense smoky-dry, spice-filled finish.

fields.name: Glenfiddich 12 Year Scotch
fields.description: Glenfiddich's original, signature single malt Scotch whisky has matured for at least 12 years in American and European oak casks. The quality of these casks is exceptional as all are individually tended by an experienced team of coopers, ensuring the whisky develops complex, elegantly rounded flavors with notes of fresh pear and subtle oak.

fields.name: Glenfiddich 12 Year Scotch
fields.description: Glenfiddich's original, signature single malt Scotch whisky has matured for at least 12 years in American and European oak casks. The quality of these casks is exceptional as all are individually tended by an experienced team of coopers, ensuring the whisky develops complex, elegantly rounded flavors with notes of fresh pear and subtle oak.

fields.name: Kaiyo The Single 7 Year Old
fields.description:
Kaiyō whisky is matured in the finest Japanese Mizunara oak casks. These casks are handmade
due to Mizunara oak’s delicate wood grain. They are among the rarest casks in the world and are
considered the finest in which to mature whisky. After years of maturing, the casks go on a final
maturation at sea voyage for up to three months, leaving from Osaka, Japan. Enjoy Kaiyō  the Single 7-Year Whisky, with notes of honey, coconut and vanilla.

fields.name: Talisker 18 Year Scotch
fields.description: Talisker 18 Year is the first regular bottling of an older Talisker. On the nose you can detect rich and fruity  Victoria plums, greengages,  dried orange peel  with some butterscotch or rum toffee and a thread of smoke. The smoke moves to the foreground, and the toffee note is joined by a light mintiness.  The body is full, pleasant and smooth. On the palate, Talisker 18 Year is sweet in front, then more assertive, with  development toward smoke, coal-tar and toffee.

fields.name: Glenfarclas 21 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: An incredibly-rounded whisky that leaves you refreshed and content. Aged in 100 percent Oloroso sherry casks, this 21 Year scotch has intense aromas of sherried fruit, tropical fruit and almonds with slight citrus notes at the end. Rich and full bodied, the spirit develops into fruit and spicy flavors before a long-lasting, smooth finish.

fields.name: Cardhu Scotch
fields.description: With clean, crisp oak and sweet malt evoking flavors of honeyed flapjacks and home-made caramel squares, this is one for the sweet-toothed among you.

fields.name: The Balvenie Peat Week 14 Year Scotch
fields.description: At a time when few Speyside distilleries were using peat in production, The Balvenie decided to distill a batch of heavily peated malt, which was laid down to mature at the distillery in Dufftown, Scotland. Ever since then they’ve dedicated one week each year, named Peat Week, to using 100% Highland peat to dry thebarley. Instead of coastal elements of iodine, salt and medicinal characteristics so commonly associated with Islay peat, Highland peat imparts earthy, woody smoke notes. This non-chill filtered expression is bottled at 48.3% ABV and matured solely in American Oak casks, providing a velvety and round taste with woody peat smoke balancing oaky vanilla and honey.

fields.name: Edradour 10 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: This handmade scotch is one of the last single malt whiskies from a traditional farm distillery still in production today. The methods of production remain virtually unchanged in the last 150 years. Edradour 10 Year has a distinctive honey flavor with hints of vanilla  and a long spicy finish.

fields.name: Balvenie 15 Year Sherry Cask Scotch
fields.description: The Balvenie 15-Year-Old Single Barrel Sherry Cask is a celebration of the unique and mysterious interaction between oak, spirit and time. This exceptional whisky is matured exclusively in a European oak sherry butt for at least 15 years. Each cask is subtly different — every barrel is hand selected for its flavor of dried fruits, nuts and spice. No more than 800 hand-numbered bottles are drawn from each sherry butt, making every bottling unique and unrepeatable.

fields.name: Balvenie 12 Year Single Barrel Scotch
fields.description: Inspired to produce an even fruitier, sweeter Balvenie, Apprentice Malt Master Kelsey McKechnie had the bright idea to import Virgin Oak barrels from Kentucky. The barrels are twice toasted, once in Kentucky and once at The Balvenie Cooperage to drive the heat further into the wood and bring out as much flavor as possible. After this extra deep toast, they are filled with classic Balvenie and laid down to further mature. The result is a delectably complex whisky with notes of caramelized fruit, oak, coconut and delicate vanilla.

fields.name: The Balvenie 14 Year Caribbean Cask Scotch
fields.description: The Balvenie Caribbean Cask 14 year old single malt whisky has been matured in traditional oak whisky casks for 14 years, and then "finished" in casks that previously held Caribbean rum. The result is the traditional smooth, honeyed character of The Balvenie married with notes of toffee and a hint of fruit, with a warm, lingering finish.

fields.name: The Balvenie 12yr American Oak
fields.description: To produce an even fruitier, sweeter Balvenie, this scotch is aged in ex-bourbon barrels and then transferred to imported virgin oak barrels from Kentucky that were deep toasted at Balvenie Cooperage. The result is a delectably complex whisky with notes of candied fruit, coconut and delicate vanilla.

fields.name: The Balvenie Doublewood 17 Year Scotch
fields.description: Cask finishing is at the heart of The Balvenie DoubleWood—it sees the whisky matured first in American oak barrels, which impart soft sweet vanilla notes, before being transferred to European oak sherry casks, where the second cask ageing adds rich spicy flavors and a depth and fullness of flavor. The DoubleWood 17 year old is an elder sibling to DoubleWood 12 year old and shares its honeyed, spicy characteristics, but it is distinctly different, with deeper vanilla notes, hints of green apple, creamy toffee and a striking richness and complexity.

fields.name: Espolon Tequila Extra Anejo
fields.description: Espolon Extra Anejo is a rare tequila that is laid to rest for six long years. It has a prominent vanilla taste that provides a rich mouthfeel. Each black bottle is handmade in Mexico and represents the Mexican art form, Barra Negro.

fields.name: Grand MacNish
fields.description: Since 1863, Grand MacNish is one of the oldest blended scotches on the market. Glasgow merchant, Robert MacNish wanted to create a lighter, smoother whisky. Grand MacNish has a fine taste of vanilla, floral, and fresh summer fruits. Its rich finish will be sure to linger.

fields.name: Night Life Coffee Liqueur
fields.description: "Night Life" from Garofalo Artisan Liqueurs is a coffee liqueur that differentiates itself from any other coffee liqueur available. It uses a custom blend of beans, roasted by an artisan coffee roaster and barista.

fields.name: Highland Park Magnus
fields.description: Magnus Eunson was a direct descendant of the Vikings who settled on Orkney hundreds of years ago. He set up his illicit still in a bothy (a small stone hut) at High Park, Kirkwall that’s still the site of Highland Park’s distillery today. And, while they say Highland Park was founded in 1798, in truth that’s just the year that the authorities caught up with Magnus – he was certainly making whisky before that!

fields.name: Glendronach 12 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: This superb richly sherried single malt is matured for at least 12 years in a combination of the finest Spanish Pedro Ximenez and Oloroso sherry casks. Non-chill filtered, of natural color and bottled at 43 percent, the Glendronach 12 Year is a sweet, creamy dram.

fields.name: Speyburn Bradan Orach
fields.description: Gaelic for ‘Golden Salmon’, Bradan Orach is a classic, welcoming Speyside whisky, matured exclusively in American oak ex-bourbon casks. This bright single malt was named in honor of the world-class salmon fishing found on the River Spey. It has an aroma of green apples, honey, lemon, and vanilla. Its taste is subtle honey and vanilla, but is still full bodied with a creamy and smooth spicy finish.

fields.name: Tomatin Scotch Whisky 14 Yr Old
fields.description: This single cask rare whisky is matured for 10 years, giving it a unique taste of raspberry jam, vanilla bean and chili pepper.

fields.name: Templeton 6 Year Rye Whiskey
fields.description: Aged six years in new American oak barrels, this limited release of Templeton Rye whiskey is 91.5 proof with an unforgettable flavor. This rye features butterscotch, vanilla, spice, cherry and green apple on the nose and fruit and tasted oak on the palate before a long spice finish.

fields.name: Minor Case Straight Rye
fields.description: A tribute to Minor Case Beam, this whiskey explores what might have been if he had the opportunity to have his stills unsilenced and his production reawakened through prohibition. Golden chestnut in color, Minor Case Rye displays earthy hints and sweet sherry notes on the nose. The palate is sweet with a hint of butterscotch and the  finish is sherry cask, giving it a smooth mouthfeel.

fields.name: Whip Saw Rye Whiskey
fields.description: A remarkably smooth yet perfectly spiced Rye. Crafted from a blend of whiskeys up to 7 years old and finished in seasoned French oak wine barrels, this whiskey has a deep amber color with aromas of vanilla crème brûlée, spiced candied fruit-cake, bergamot, banana, earth and wood-smoke with a hint of black truffle. Flavors of citrus, caramel and butterscotch with a touch of ginger create a silky finish. Delicious straight up or in a cocktail.

fields.name: The Glenlivet 12 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: This classic malt is first matured in traditional oak, before spending time in American oak casks which impart notes of vanilla and gives the whisky its distinctive smoothness. The mineral-rich water that comes from Josie’s Well helps form the flavors during mashing and fermentation, while the specific height and width of the copper stills add a delicate yet complex character.

fields.name: The Glenlivet 12 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: This classic malt is first matured in traditional oak, before spending time in American oak casks which impart notes of vanilla and gives the whisky its distinctive smoothness. The mineral-rich water that comes from Josie’s Well helps form the flavors during mashing and fermentation, while the specific height and width of the copper stills add a delicate yet complex character.

fields.name: The Glenlivet 12 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: This classic malt is first matured in traditional oak, before spending time in American oak casks which impart notes of vanilla and gives the whisky its distinctive smoothness. The mineral-rich water that comes from Josie’s Well helps form the flavors during mashing and fermentation, while the specific height and width of the copper stills add a delicate yet complex character.

fields.name: The Glenlivet 12 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: This classic malt is first matured in traditional oak, before spending time in American oak casks which impart notes of vanilla and gives the whisky its distinctive smoothness. The mineral-rich water that comes from Josie’s Well helps form the flavors during mashing and fermentation, while the specific height and width of the copper stills add a delicate yet complex character.

fields.name: The Glenlivet 12 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: This classic malt is first matured in traditional oak, before spending time in American oak casks which impart notes of vanilla and gives the whisky its distinctive smoothness. The mineral-rich water that comes from Josie’s Well helps form the flavors during mashing and fermentation, while the specific height and width of the copper stills add a delicate yet complex character.

fields.name: Glengoyne 10 Year Scotch
fields.description: Fresh green apples, toffee and a hint of nuttiness: this is the taste of slowly distilled barley that Glengoyne dries by air, never peat, and of hand selected oak casks. The finish is sweet and malty.

fields.name: Talisker Distillers Edition
fields.description: Talisker Distiller's Edition is a very chewable single malt, with sweetness having the edge on dryness. It features crisp peat notes at first that soften to enormous richness in the mouth. There is sweet, roasty malt with a heathery dryness. The sherry notes keep back some of Talisker's usual pepper; in its place is a luscious, slightly oily sweetness with ripe, juicy fruit and vanilla. The finish contains very deep cocoa notes, vanilla and lingering  earthy peat.

fields.name: Glendronach 15yr Revival
fields.description: After ceasing production in 2015, The GlenDronach Revival Aged 15 years now returns to the core range of the distillery’s line-up. The expression embodies The GlenDronach’s signature style of Spanish Sherry Cask maturation in fine Pedro Ximenez and Oloroso sherry casks from Andalucia, quietly growing in stature for 15 years in the darkness of their dunnage warehouses.

fields.name: The Macallan 18 Year Triple Cask Matured Scotch
fields.description: The Macallan Triple Cask Matured 18 Years Old is crafted in a triple cask combination of European and American sherry seasoned oak casks and American ex-bourbon oak casks. Exquisitely married together, this trinity of spirits produces an exotic single malt with orange, velvety cocoa and wood spice flavors.

fields.name: Highland Park 18 Year Viking Pride Scotch
fields.description: Slow-burning, aromatic peat from Hobbister Moor; hand turned floor maltings, Sherry seasoned European oak casks, cool maturation in our temperate island climate and a long and unhurried harmonization process. Like our founder, Magnus Eunson, we share our Viking ancestors’ commitment to skilled craftsmanship as well as their proud, independent spirit.

fields.name: Glendronach 18 Yr
fields.description: The GlenDronach 18 Year is a sherried single malt matured in the finest Spanish Oloroso sherry casks. On the nose you'll experience sweet aromatics of fudge and Muscovado sugar, fruit compote and glacier morello cherries. The palate is rich and seductive, with flavors of stewed fruits, all-spice, aged Oloroso sherry, toasted walnut bread and chocolate orange.

fields.name: Siesta Key Toasted Coconut Rum
fields.description: Handcrafted in small batches at a small, artisan distillery in Sarasota, Fla., Siesta Key Toasted Coconut Rum is made by infusing rum with real toasted coconut, without any artificial flavors or sweeteners. Making coconut rum this way is a rarity in the rum industry where "coconut" rums are usually flavored by pouring liquid flavoring in the base rum. It is a lot of work to make toasted coconut rum by infusion, but you can taste the difference.

fields.name: El Buho Especial Mango
fields.description:
Overwhelming nose of ripe mango followed by a smooth agave distillate reminiscent of a pechuga. Cooked agave finish with green pepper notes.
Overwhelming nose of ripe mango followed by a smooth agave distillate reminiscent of a pechuga. Cooked agave finish with green pepper notes.
Overwhelming nose of ripe mango followed by a smooth agave distillate reminiscent of a pechuga. Cooked agave finish with green pepper notes.

fields.name: Mekhong Spirit Of Thailand
fields.description: Mekhong is Thailand's national spirit and named after the mighty Mekhong River, which flows along its border. Mekhong has a wonderfully smooth aroma and inviting taste that will instantly remind you of the tropics of Southeast Asia. Mekhong's amber and reddish copper color paves the way to a balanced and smooth flavor of spicy ginger, toffee, citrus and vanilla flavor, all fused together to provide a unique and well balanced drink. Mekhong can be enjoyed straight, with a mixer, or in cocktails and of course perfectly complements spicy Thai food.

fields.name: Fcd White Label Corn Whiskey
fields.description: All FCD Heritage Spirits are small batch distilled in a pot still. There spirits are proofed at 100 to allow for richer and deeper flavors. The White Label Corn Whiskey is their flagship spirit. It is a 4th generation recipe handed down and perfected over 100 years.

fields.name: Deaths Door White Whiskey
fields.description: Death's Door White Whisky was a pioneer in the whisky category and has an 80:20 mash bill of hard red winter wheat to malted barley. The unique character of this spirit starts back in the process of fermenting the grains, utilizing a champagne yeast rather than a traditional whisky yeast. The spirit is then double-distilled up to 160 proof (80% ABV), rested in stainless steel, proofed down to 80 (40% ABV) and finished in uncharred Minnesota oak barrels to help bring the "white whisky" together and to meld this unique spirits' flavors. The bouquet is one part "South of the Border": artisanal cachaça, tequila; and one part "Eastern": sweet potato shochu/soju and earthy sake. Yet, the palate is unmistakably whisky: a smooth double-distilled varietal with vanilla, chocolate covered raisin, and dark cherry flavors.

fields.name: Joia Spirit Craft Cocktail Greyhound
fields.description: Joia Sparkling Greyhound is flavored with bright tangy grapefruit, a whisper of chamomile, and a dash of cardamom. Crisp, clear vodka lightly carbonated with a few bubbles. 4 pack (355 ml) | ABV: 6%

fields.name: Oban Bay Reserve Game Of Thrones Nights Watch
fields.description: A non-age-statement Highlands single malt, featuring an appropriately dark and simple label with the vow of the Night’s Watch. Just as The Wall separates Westeros from the wild lands beyond, Oban Distillery sits on the border between Scotland’s western islands and highlands.

fields.name: Bowmore 25 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: A whisky that is meant to be savored slowly. Every delicious drop of this exquisitely balanced malt has been matured for a quarter of a century in North American bourbon and Spanish sherry casks. Exceptional even by Bowmore's standards, our highly acclaimed Bowmore 25 Year Old exhibits the finest qualities of each.

fields.name: Bowmore 15yr Darkest Scotch
fields.description: Matured in an inspired combination of both bourbon and sherry casks, it's the final three years spent in Oloroso sherry casks that gives Bowmore 15 Year Old "Darkest," one of the most beautifully balanced Bowmores, the rich, deep color reflected in its name, and its warming finish. Breathe in delicious dark chocolate, sun-dried fruits and a tell-tale wisp of Islay smoke. Sip wonderful cedar wood and rich treacle toffee. Savor the robust and complex finish with a hint of sherry tannin.

fields.name: Laphroaig Single Malt
fields.description: This full, refractive, gold scotch has a very peaty with the tangy sweetness of the sea. Its full and hardy body is the perfect medium to express its richy smoky, fully peated flavor that has a  hint of sweetness. Its finish is lingering and unique with intense licorice undertones.

fields.name: Laphroaig Triplewood
fields.description: The initial flavor is sweet with a gentle mixture of sweet raisins and creamy apricots and a trace of the dry peat smoke at the back. With a touch of water, the peat smoke comes to the fore and masks the gentler fruitier notes. Even with the maturation being carried out in 1st fill bourbons, quarter casks and sherry butts, the intense bonfire ash smell of the earthy peat cannot be masked. With no water, a large initial burst of peat is followed by creamier flavors of vanilla and fruit with  a suggestion of sherry sweetness. The finish is extremely long but balanced by a sweet smooth caramel taste.

fields.name: Laphroaig Quarter Cask
fields.description: Laphroaig Quarter Cask’s distilling process represents Laphroaig breathing new life into a once-defunct tradition: the use of the smaller cask size, which ensures increased contact with the oak, creating a soft and velvety edge to complement Laphroaig’s distinctive peatiness. On the nose the sensation is toffee and caramel, caused by the vanillas and tannins of the American oak, plus a dryness from the wood oil. The finish is long and alternates between this sweetness and smoke.

fields.name: Laphroaig Lore
fields.description: Laphroaig Lore is a complex marriage of both classical Laphroaig styles and many newer ages of Laphroaig. The marriage draws from the peaty power of Laphroaig in the same vein as Laphroaig Quarter Cask but with the smoothness of double matured stock finished in European oak hogsheads. To add even further depth and complexity they used their most heavily peated whiskey matured in ex-Laphroaig barrels along with some fully sherry matured casks. The result is stunningly complex.

fields.name: Bruichladdich Octomore 101
fields.description: Distilled from Scottish barley in 2013, Octomore 10.1 is the benchmark of the 10s series. Deliberately stripped back to an ex- American oak maturation, aged just 5 years old, the .1 edition exposes the structure and presence of the Octomore spirit. Combining smoke with a modest maturation, this 10.1 first and foremost demonstrates the true potential of a considered, patient distillation.

fields.name: Bunnahabhain 18 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: Bunnahabhain 18 Year has warm aromas of honeyed nuts, sticky toffee pudding and baking spices. It's a rich, dense expression with flavors of roasted chestnuts and a soft oak spice that lead to a lengthy finish.

fields.name: Caol Ila 12 Year Scotch
fields.description: Smoky-smoothness and a sweet start to create a pleasant, relaxed disposition and charred dry finish. A natural partner for a strong spicy sausage.

fields.name: Caol Ila 15 Year Scotch
fields.description: Adopting the forceful style of earlier unpeated expressions, this complex Caol Ila faithfully displays the make’s typical youthful and vibrant DNA as it marries their glorious fruit and hints of smoke and the sea with smooth mature tannins, becoming succulent and softly relaxed with water.

fields.name: Game Of Thrones   A Song Of Fire
fields.description: In celebration of the final season of Game of Thrones and inspired by House Targaryen and her fire-breathing dragons, this blend features peated malt from Caol Ila for a subtle smoke. Tempered by a rich, round sweetness, the full-bodied flavor delivers subtle red fruit, a hint of spice and sweet smoke. This blend is best enjoyed neat for a warm, smooth finish. The Game of Thrones epic has been a tale of two halves from the very beginning. When all is said and done, the inevitable meeting of two primal elements will simply be known as A Song of Ice and Fire.

fields.name: Classic Malts Collection Coastal Whiskey Pack
fields.description: The Classic Malts Coastal Whiskey Pack includes Caol Ila 12 Year, Talisker 10 Year and Clynelish 14 Year.

fields.name: Lagavulin 8 Year Scotch
fields.description: This limited edition 8 year scotch features faint hints of milk chocolate and lemon which develop into fragrant, tea-scented smoke alongside nose-drying, maritime aromas. On the palate, you'll find a full-on Lagavulin taste that’s  charred, with minty, dark chocolate. The finish is clean, long and smoky, with subtle, minted smoke and chocolate tannins. Enjoy neat in a whisky nosing glass or with a drop of water.

fields.name: Cardhu Gold Reserve Game Of Thrones Targaryen
fields.description: Cardhu Distillery, founded by two legendary women—Helen Cumming and her daughter-in-law, Elizabeth—is the perfect distillery to product the scotch of House Targaryan, led by the fierce Daenerys Targaryan. This single malt scotch features the House Targaryan three-headed dragon on its label.

fields.name: Johnnie Walker Select Casks
fields.description: Johnnie Walker Select Casks is a scotch blend that showcases the best of Scottish blending and maturation expertise. With Cardhu single malt at the heart of the blend, Johnnie Walker uses whiskies matured for at least ten years in first-fill American oak casks to create this blend. It is then finished in ex-rye whiskey casks, creating a complex new whiskey with rich layers of flavor starting with creamy vanilla notes and transitioning to a spicier finish.

fields.name: Buchanans Deluxe 12 Year Scotch
fields.description: Buchanan's is an excellent example of quality with a house style given by James Buchanan. The brand now stands for prestige and tradition.

fields.name: Buchanans Deluxe 12 Year Scotch
fields.description: Buchanan's is an excellent example of quality with a house style given by James Buchanan. The brand now stands for prestige and tradition.

fields.name: Clynelish Reserve Game Of Thrones Tyrell
fields.description: The Clynelish Distillery, located among green pastures and rolling hills, is similar to the lush, fertile Highgarden from where the Tyrells come. The Highland single malt is light and floral but, like the Tyrell family, “not to be underestimated.”

fields.name: Game Of Thrones   A Song Of Ice
fields.description: This limited edition Johnnie Walker celebrates the final season of Game of Thrones and is inspired by the wild dwellers of the icy North. Malt from Clynelish, one of Scotland's most Northern distilleries, gives this blend a crisp, clean taste. The blend's delicate flavor is green and grassy with notes of vanilla and tropical fruit. Enjoy over ice for a cold, smooth finish. The Game of Thrones epic has been a tale of two halves from the very beginning. When all is said and done, the inevitable meeting of two primal elements will simply be known as A Song of Ice and Fire.

fields.name: Johnnie Walker Blue Ghost And Rare Scotch
fields.description:
Johnnie Walker Blue Label Ghost and Rare is a rich, velvety smooth blend of eight treasured Scotch Whiskies including three "ghost" whiskies from the silent distilleries of Cambus, Pittyvaich and the Highland Single Malt, Brora.
Johnnie Walker  blended the three ghost whiskies with five rare expressions of malt and grains from the existing distilleries of Royal Lochnagar, Clynelish, Glenkinchie, Glenlossie and Cameronbridge.
The result is a wonderfully smooth Scotch, with the fruity sweetness of pineapple, rich notes of hazelnut and dark chocolate and a subtle smoky finish.

fields.name: Lagavulin 9 Year Game Of Thrones Lannister
fields.description: This Islay single malt matches the Lannisters as its creation reflects the same cunning and tenacity for which the family is known. The bottle showcases the house’s lion sigil, and the liquid has a rich flavor, a reflection of the Lannisters riches.

fields.name: Cragganmore Distillers Edition
fields.description: Twelve year old Cragganmore double-matured in ex-bodega Port cask wood for succulence and rounded depth of flavour to enhance the complex smoky aromas and tastes of the regular release.

fields.name: Glenfarclas 25 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: A great after-dinner whisky so rich and full, it's a dessert in itself! On the nose, Glenfarclas 25 Year Scotch is complex yet refined with tempting aromas of marmalade, honey, freshly ground coffee, sherry and nuts. On the palate, the sherry and oak fight for your attention yet neither overpower. This scotch ends with an intense, dry and malty finish.

fields.name: Glenmorangie 100ML Sampler 4 pk
fields.description: Glenmorangie Single Malt Scotch Whisky originates in the Scottish Highlands where it is distilled in the tallest malt whisky stills in Scotland, expertly matured in the finest oak casks, only used twice. Glenmorangie distillery, founded in 1843 is renowned as a pioneer in whisky making, uniting tradition with innovation. The Taster Pack is an invitation for those looking to explore the classic Glenmorangie Single Malt experience. The journey starts with Glenmorangie Original, then enables you to explore the award-winning, and newly renovated Extra Matured Range.

fields.name: Johnnie Walker White Walker
fields.description: In celebration of the final season of Game of Thrones, White Walker is inspired by White Walkers beyond The Wall. This limited edition whisky utilizes thermochromic ink to reveal a frosty surprise message when frozen. Featuring notes of caramelized sugar,  vanilla and fresh red berries with a touch of orchard fruit, this whisky develops in complexity as it warms to room temperature. Best served cold directly from the freezer.

fields.name: Dalwhinnie Winters Frost Game Of Thrones Stark
fields.description: One of the highest and coldest distilleries in Scotland, Dalwhinnie is shaped by extreme conditions, just like the Starks’ qualities of resilience and strength are shaped by their home of Winterfell in the North. This Highland single malt features a fearsome direwolf on its label.

fields.name: The Singleton Of Glendullan Game Of Thrones Tully
fields.description: The light straw shimmer of this liquid hints at the cask lineage of this Single Malt that is 100% ex-Bourbon casks; that’s confirmed by the heavy Madagascar vanilla opening on the nose followed by a suggestion of sweet, clove spice that develops over time. On the palate it’s initially driven by orchard fruits like apple; the clove returns but now with cinnamon as the palate develops. The finish moves away from citrus into a red berry compote with vanilla cheesecake and a pronounced cereal spice finish.

fields.name: The Dalmore 12 YO
fields.description: Intense and firm. This scotch is well structured with silky smooth malty tones; a hint of Oloroso sherry lingers in the background. It shows great finesse, extolling fragrances of orange, marmalade and spiced notes. It attacks on the mouth with finesse, more elegance than muscle. The aged Oloroso butts smooth its rich, fleshy body with great harmony. Almost a concentrated citric mouth-feel captivates and tantalises the middle part of your tongue. An aftertaste of great abundance rewards the palate. A Highland malt of great distinction.

fields.name: The Dalmore 15 Yr
fields.description: This delicate and approachable vintage is initially matured for 12 years in American white oak ex-bourbon casks. The character of The Dalmore 15 is achieved by then splitting the whisky equally between three different sherry woods: Amoroso, Apostoles, and Matusalem oloroso for a further three years. The spirit is finally married together in an upstanding sherry butt cask allowing the flavors to infuse.

fields.name: The Dalmore Cigar Malt
fields.description: The perfect accompaniment to the finest cigars, this single malt is matured in American white oak ex-bourbon casks, Matusalem oloroso sherry casks and Cabernet Sauvignon barriques.

fields.name: The Dalmore King Alexander III
fields.description: This is the only single malt in the world to currently unite a unique six-cask finish, giving it a complex, yet smooth single malt.

fields.name: The Dalmore 18yr Single Malt
fields.description: Matured in American white oak ex-bourbon casks and aged Matusalem oloroso sherry casks, Macallan 18 Year features dark chocolate, candied citrus fruits, rich coffee, nutmeg and soft liquorice on the palate; citrus fruits and rich molasses in its finish.

fields.name: The Dalmore 25 Year Scotch
fields.description: This 25 year Scotch is matured in American white oak ex-bourbon casks and aged Tawny Port pipes and casks, exclusive to The Dalmore, which have held 30 year old Matusalem oloroso sherry. Madagascan vanilla pods, thick treacle toffee and chocolate truffles abound on the palate before finishing notes of maple syrup, dark chocolate and spiced gingerbread.

fields.name: Dalwhinnie Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: From Lochan an Doire-Uaine, the lake in the green grove, all the pure spring water used in distilling Dalwhinnie flows over rich local peat through Allt an t'Suic, the distiller burn. No other distillery may use the water from this source—therefore no other distillery is able to yield Dalwhinnie's uniquely clean, accessible and malty-sweet taste. It's aromatic profile of toffee and fruit salad leads slowly into a finish of floral notes and custard.

fields.name: Dalwhinnie Distillers Edition
fields.description: Dalwhinnie is made in the highest working distillery in Scotland at an altitude of 1,173 feet with stream water that flows from mountain lochs. Each Distiller's Edition expression undergoes a second (or double) maturation in casks that have previously held a fortified wine. This Highland Single Malt Scotch Whisky is a resilient blend of Speyside heather-honey sweetness and Lowland intensity. Lovers of Dalwhinnie will appreciate the way the fragrance of Oloroso sherry overlays, but does not mask, the heather honey distillery notes.

fields.name: Devils Backbone Fresh Hop Gin  Tonic
fields.description: All-natural true crafted bar cocktail. Devils Backbone Fresh Hop Gin is distilled with fresh hops, juniper, coriander and other botanicals.  The small batch gin is blended with natural tonic water which makes for a very fun and refreshing drink. Pour over ice and enjoy with a slice of lime.

fields.name: Beefeater Pink Gin
fields.description: Beefeater Pink, the first gin in the U.S. naturally flavored with hints of strawberry for a new generation of gin drinkers. A refreshing and delicately sweet natural strawberry flavors with soft juniper and citrus finish for a finely balanced contemporary gin. Best served with seltzer, lemonade, tonic or on the rocks with chopped fresh strawberries.

fields.name: Glenmorangie Lasanta Scotch
fields.description: Elegant but full bodied, this whiskey has spent ten years maturing in American white oak ex-bourbon casks before being extra-matured for a further two years in Oloroso and PX sherry casks from Jerez in Spain. This long treatment results in a complex array of flavors including warm spices, chocolate covered raisins, honeycomb and caramel toffee. All of those flavors and more stay with you for the duration of its long finish.

fields.name: The Macallan 12yr Scotch
fields.description: Rich in both dried fruit and sherry, with a subtle toffee sweetness and pleasant touch of spice flavor with a touch of sherry sweetness and wood.

fields.name: Dewars White Label Scotch
fields.description: Dewar blends up to 40 of Scotland's finest single malt and grain whiskies to create Dewar's White Label. Each is hand-picked to create this full, round whisky. Each whisky imparts different notes and profiles, but the experienced taster can detects hints of honey, peach and apple that lead into a woody finish. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 10 bottles

fields.name: Dewars White Label Scotch
fields.description: Dewar blends up to 40 of Scotland's finest single malt and grain whiskies to create Dewar's White Label. Each is hand-picked to create this full, round whisky. Each whisky imparts different notes and profiles, but the experienced taster can detects hints of honey, peach and apple that lead into a woody finish. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 10 bottles

fields.name: Dewars White Label Scotch
fields.description: Dewar blends up to 40 of Scotland's finest single malt and grain whiskies to create Dewar's White Label. Each is hand-picked to create this full, round whisky. Each whisky imparts different notes and profiles, but the experienced taster can detects hints of honey, peach and apple that lead into a woody finish. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 10 bottles

fields.name: Dewars White Label Scotch
fields.description: Dewar blends up to 40 of Scotland's finest single malt and grain whiskies to create Dewar's White Label. Each is hand-picked to create this full, round whisky. Each whisky imparts different notes and profiles, but the experienced taster can detects hints of honey, peach and apple that lead into a woody finish. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 10 bottles

fields.name: Dewars White Label Scotch
fields.description: Dewar blends up to 40 of Scotland's finest single malt and grain whiskies to create Dewar's White Label. Each is hand-picked to create this full, round whisky. Each whisky imparts different notes and profiles, but the experienced taster can detects hints of honey, peach and apple that lead into a woody finish. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 10 bottles

fields.name: Dewars White Label Scotch
fields.description: Dewar blends up to 40 of Scotland's finest single malt and grain whiskies to create Dewar's White Label. Each is hand-picked to create this full, round whisky. Each whisky imparts different notes and profiles, but the experienced taster can detects hints of honey, peach and apple that lead into a woody finish. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 10 bottles

fields.name: Balcones 1 Texas Single Malt
fields.description: Using Golden Promise barley from Scotland, fermented slowly at low temperatures before being twice distilled in copper pot stills from Scotland. The resulting spirit is aged in American, French and European species of oak casks. Each batch is unique and numbered individually. "Texas made, Texas proud."

fields.name: Filibuster Dual Cask Rye Whiskey
fields.description: Dilawri Barrels blends small batches of traditionally crafted spicy young rye whiskey with a bit of barrel-aged bourbon for balance, and lets them talk it out for a few months in wine-seasoned French oak casks before bottling. The result is the Dual Cask Rye, a unique whiskey that showcases Rye's fiery spice, but is uncommonly smooth going down. This unique process takes more time, and costs more money, but the results speak for themselves.

fields.name: Lauders Scotch
fields.description: Created by Archibald Lauder in 1834 in Glasgow, Lauder’s blends sweet and floral flavors with rich layers of toffee for a lingering smooth finish.

fields.name: Trump Monticello CRU
fields.description: Made from fruit grown in the foothills of Carter's Mountain in Charlottesville, Cru is created by blending Chardonnay juice with grape brandy in lieu of a traditional fermentation. This fortified wine is then aged for over a year in American bourbon barrels. The result is an aperitif wine with 14% residual sugar.

fields.name: Copper Fox Rye Whiskey
fields.description:
Distilled from a unique blend of thoroughbred grains from the Northern Neck of Virginia; 2/3 rye, 1/3 barley, hand-malted and kiln-dried with Applewood and cherry wood smoke.

Double pot-distilled at a low 150 to 160 proof to enhance the fruitiness and matured in ex-bourbon barrels with progressive infusions of toasted apple wood and oak chips.

fields.name: Glenmorangie Quinta Ruban Scotch
fields.description: Glenmorangie Quinta Ruban is a velvety-textured single malt whisky. A mature Glenmorangie that is transferred from the original ex-bourbon cask and then extra matured or "finished" in port pipes, shipped from the "Quintas" or wine estates of Portugal. Maturation in ruby port pipes develops the Quinta Ruban into a voluptuously smooth spirit with a complex balance of sweet and dry flavors such as dark mint chocolate, tangerines, Seville oranges and sandalwood.

fields.name: Tomatin 12 Year Scotch
fields.description: Tomatin 12 Year Old is smooth and silky, having been matured in traditional Scotch, ex-Bourbon and ex-Spanish Sherry casks. A rich, fruity aroma is the prelude to sweet flavors of ripe apples, pears and a subtle hint of nut before the long, pleasantly oily finish.

fields.name: Lagavulin Single Malt
fields.description: Dark intense Lagavulin (pronounced Laga-voolin after the Gaelic Laggan Mhouillin, the hollow where the mill is) comes from a whitewashed jumble of buildings by the sea on Islay's rocky southern shore. Founded in 1816, this is a great Islay malt. Pungent and potent, with richly peaty, deep, smoky flavor, it has an intense, long, ambrosial finish.

fields.name: Glen Scotia 15 Year Scotch
fields.description: The whisky has been gently matured in American oak barrels, which deliver the true character of a 15 year old Campbeltown single malt. The signature nose has hints of vanilla oak, interwoven with the subtle notes of sea spray and spicy aromatic fruits. The palate is surprisingly dry before a firm finish.

fields.name: Glenfarclas 10 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: Gloriously smooth, yet with the depth and finish you would normally only expect of a much older dram. A wonderfully sherried whisky and an excellent aperitif.

fields.name: Wyoming Whiskey Small Batch
fields.description: Wyoming Whiskey Small Batch Bourbon Whiskey is a traditional bourbon made in an nontraditional place. It is made from Wyoming-grown non-GMO corn, wheat and malted barley and aged in full-sized oak barrels for at least five years in Kirby, Wyoming. Each batch is constructed out of 40 barrels selected to create a consistently smooth and very drinkable bourbon.

fields.name: Glendronarch Parliament 21 Year Scotch
fields.description: Matured in a combination of the finest Oloroso and Pedro Ximenez sherry casks for a minimum of 21 years, the Parliament continues the great GlenDronach tradition of offering fruit-laden intensity in its single malts. This rich expression has been named Parliament after the colony, or parliament, of rooks that have been nesting in the trees that overlook the GlenDronach distillery for almost 200 years.

fields.name: Glenfarclas 17 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: Glenfarclas 17 Year has a complex nose, with distinctive butterscotch, sherried fruit and peat smoke aromas. The palate is full-flavored and balanced, full of sherry sweet malty tones and a touch of peat smoke. The finish is long lasting and smooth, with a hint of spice and sherry sweetness.

fields.name: The Singleton Of Glendullan 18yr
fields.description: Unusually from freshly charred American oak hogsheads, this fine cask-strength expression is much spicier than is usual for The Singleton Glen Ord, while retaining its signature smoothness and appealing richness.

fields.name: Glenfiddich 14 Year Scotch
fields.description: A rich, sweet and vibrant single malt that delivers beautifully complex flavors of woody spices combined with ripe summer fruit. It's an expression in a class all its own and one that will inspire scotch and bourbon lovers alike, to rethink whiskey.

fields.name: Glenfiddich 18 Yr Ancient Reserve
fields.description: Glenfiddich uses fine Spanish Oloroso wood and American oak to mature this rich, intriguingly fruity and robust oak expression, but there are many reasons why this expression is special. Every batch is individually numbered and carefully watched over. Each has extraordinary consistency and character from an intense marrying period, and a warming, distinguished finish.

fields.name: Glenfiddich 12yr
fields.description: Carefully matured in the finest American oak and European oak sherry casks for at least 12 years, it is mellowed in oak marrying tuns to create its sweet and subtle oak flavors.

fields.name: Glenfiddich 12yr
fields.description: Carefully matured in the finest American oak and European oak sherry casks for at least 12 years, it is mellowed in oak marrying tuns to create its sweet and subtle oak flavors.

fields.name: Glenfiddich Single Malt
fields.description: While most whiskies today mature in oak, sherry casks were more prominent in 1963. The result, then and now, is a spirit contrasting many other expressions. The aroma is floral with the hallmark Glenfiddich pear, followed by lively fruit notes, biscuity with a soft vanilla oakiness and deliciously dry finish.

fields.name: Glenfiddich Grand Cru 23yr
fields.description: This exclusive Glenfiddich expression has been matured for 23 years in American and European oak casks and elegantly finished in rare French cuvee casks. The finest flavors from Scotland and France have been fused together through the art of experimentation. Grand Cru exudes aromas of of apple blossom, freshly baked bread and candied lemon and layers of rich vanilla oak, sweet brioche, sandalwood, pear sorbet and white grape on the palate.

fields.name: Glenfiddich Gran Reserva 21 Year
fields.description: Made with handpicked selected barrels, this whiskey matured for 21 years on‐site. By finishing the 21 Year Old in Caribbean rum casks, it is roused with extra exotic notes of ginger, fig, lime and banana and vibrant spicy toffee warmth. The taste is initially soft, then brisk with a vibrant touch of smoke, oak, lime, ginger and spices. The result is a very long and dry finish with a touch of spice.

fields.name: Glenfiddich Project XX Single Malt Whisky
fields.description:
Twenty of the whisky industry’s most exceptional minds came together to create this truly unique, pioneering single malt expression.

With its deep golden hue, Project XX embodies the warm, fruity character of a classic Glenfiddich whisky with hints of apple blossom, summer fruits and ripe pear. But its multiple personalities are revealed with hints of sweet candy floss, cinnamon spice, almonds and rich port tannins with the odd whisper of licorice. Deep and mellow, the finish is long lasting with a lingering sweet oak taste.

fields.name: Glenfiddich Age Of Discovery 19 Year Single Malt S
fields.description: Glenfiddich 19yr: Exclusively matured for nineteen years in American oak casks previously used to mellow fine bourbon whiskey.  Unlike other whiskies this is not finished. It is 100% bourbon matured making this more original and unique.  The taste is overall complex and layered, developing overtime, especially with the addition of a little water. You can nose warm, crunchy toffee and deep citrus notes, marmalade on toast and a whiff of a fine old orange liqueur, are balanced by dry almost smoky notes of oak tannin.

fields.name: Glenfiddich Fire  Cane
fields.description: Glenfiddich Fire & Cane is a bold fusion of smoky and sweet notes. By marrying peated whisky and malts matured in bourbon barrels, and then finishing in Latin rum casks, Glenfiddich created an exquisite whisky with campfire smokiness and toffee sweetness.

fields.name: Glenfiddich India Pale Ale Cask
fields.description: In Glenfiddich’s first groundbreaking experiment they have proven that traditional whisky casks can still be seasoned in a pioneering way. Collaborating with a local Speyside craft brewer, they created a bold and zesty India pale ale beer to imbue the rich oak casks with extra hoppy notes. The experiment resulted in the first single malt Scotch whisky ever finished in craft India pale ale casks.

fields.name: The Glenlivet Nadurra Oloroso
fields.description:
Nàdurra Oloroso has been matured exclusively in first fill Oloroso sherry oak casks from the Jerez region of Spain: the most highly prized and sought after casks used by whisky makers.
First fill Oloroso sherry casks have long been famed for imparting wonderfully rich, luxurious flavors of dried fruits and warm spices to single malt whisky.

fields.name: The Glenlivet 18 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: Over the course of 18 years The Glenlivet's Master Distiller takes this expression through a combination of cask types, including both first and second-fill American oak (for tropical fruitiness) and ex-sherry oak (for spicy complexity). The result is a gorgeous single malt that is complex, yet elegant and balanced.

fields.name: Grants Scotch
fields.description: Grant's Family Reserve is based upon the original recipe to which William Grant, the founder of the Company, first put his name in 1898. It is one of the world's leading and most instantly recognisable Scotch Whiskies, with a taste that has been passed down through five generations of Grant's family. The nose is unmistakably Speyside with fluting malty notes. A clean aroma with a sweetish fruity edge. Intriguingly and deliciousily structured. It has a firm mouth feel with banana/vanilla sweetness balancing sharper malty notes. Clean but very complex. A long smooth, lingering finish.

fields.name: Grants Scotch
fields.description: Grant's Family Reserve is based upon the original recipe to which William Grant, the founder of the Company, first put his name in 1898. It is one of the world's leading and most instantly recognisable Scotch Whiskies, with a taste that has been passed down through five generations of Grant's family. The nose is unmistakably Speyside with fluting malty notes. A clean aroma with a sweetish fruity edge. Intriguingly and deliciousily structured. It has a firm mouth feel with banana/vanilla sweetness balancing sharper malty notes. Clean but very complex. A long smooth, lingering finish.

fields.name: The Glenlivet 14 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: Featuring raisin-rich cognac and signature citrus notes married with creamy smoothness, the luscious liquid has traveled from bourbon and sherry casks to a selective finish in cognac casks. Bursting with sweet and fruity aromas and inspired by Captain Bill Smith Grant, great-grandson of Founder George Smith, The Glenlivet 14 Year  shines as a proud celebration of The Glenlivet's Speyside craft. Wander from the misty glens of Scottish Speyside to the rolling vineyards of France’s Cognac region at every sip.

fields.name: The Glenlivet 14 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: Featuring raisin-rich cognac and signature citrus notes married with creamy smoothness, the luscious liquid has traveled from bourbon and sherry casks to a selective finish in cognac casks. Bursting with sweet and fruity aromas and inspired by Captain Bill Smith Grant, great-grandson of Founder George Smith, The Glenlivet 14 Year  shines as a proud celebration of The Glenlivet's Speyside craft. Wander from the misty glens of Scottish Speyside to the rolling vineyards of France’s Cognac region at every sip.

fields.name: Dewars Special Reserve 12 Year Scotch
fields.description: This scotch boasts a complex and sweet flavor profile. Powerful notes of thick creamy malt coat the taste buds while subtle notes of juicy fruit and toasted barley add a unmistakable complexity.

fields.name: Dewars Special Reserve 12 Year Scotch
fields.description: This scotch boasts a complex and sweet flavor profile. Powerful notes of thick creamy malt coat the taste buds while subtle notes of juicy fruit and toasted barley add a unmistakable complexity.

fields.name: Dewars 18 YR Founders Reserve
fields.description: A precious dram. Putting the whisky back into the cask to mature a second time after blending allows all of the older and characterful whiskies to get to know each other before they go into the bottle. With flavors that go hand in hand with an older whisky (nuttiness and marzipan to name just two), age doesn't come without sacrifice—over half of the cask will evaporate during the aging process. What's left behind is all you need to concern yourself with–an amazing scotch.

fields.name: Wild Shot Resposado With Worm
fields.description: Wild Shot Reposado is aged for six months in oak casks after distillation. The result is a high-quality, aged, smoky flavor with a long smooth finish. Recommended to be consumed straight, either sipped chilled or as a shot with lime and salt. "I like to put Wild Shot in the freezer and leave it in there all the time, instead of the liquor cabinet. I pour it straight and sip it like scotch." - Toby Keith

fields.name: Glenkinchie 24 YR
fields.description: Part of the Diageo Special Releases 2016 collection, this limited edition Lowland Single Malt was distilled in 1991 at Glenkinchie and matured in refill European oak butts. Aged for 24 years, this is the oldest cask strength expression from the distillery in this series with only 5,928 individually numbered bottles available worldwide.The nose offers tangy lime notes with toffee apple and hints of walnuts on a biscuit base. Pineapple, orange and raisin emerge with caramel and melting butter. The palate is smooth and warming becoming spicy and woody with cedar, banana toffee and vanilla cream. Deep ginger notes and crunchy cereals develop before a long and warm finish with cinnamon characteristics.

fields.name: Glenkinchie Distillers Edition
fields.description: After mellowing in a refill cask to develop the soft distillery character for a decade, a secondary maturation in a specifically chosen Amontillado cask wood ensures that all the good work continues in Glenkinchie Distiller's Edition.

fields.name: Glenlivet Xxv 25 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: The XXV is a batch-produced whisky finished in individually selected ex-sherry butts, which impart a nutty spiciness. Rich amber in color, Glenlivet 25 Year features dark chocolate with scents of raisins on the nose. The taste is silky and sweet  with cinnamon notes before a long, rich and balanced finish.

fields.name: The Glenlivet Founders Reserve
fields.description: Boasting the classic flavors of The Glenlivet bound up in a creamy, smooth texture. This expression is The Glenlivet's tribute to their founder.

fields.name: The Glenlivet French Oak Reserve 15 Yr Old
The Glenlivet Archive 21 Year Single Malt Scotch
Glenmorangie The Original 18 Yr
fields.description: The 18 year old is a single malt Scotch of serious distinction. Once it has matured for fifteen years in American white oak casks, approximately 30 percent is transferred into Spanish Oloroso casks to spend a further three years maturing. Then, when both elements have reached 18 years, they are blended back together to create a whisky with a rich bouquet and full, rounded flavor.

fields.name: Glenmorangie The Original 10 Yr
fields.description:
Imagine yourself in an Italian garden surrounded with mandarin, lemon, apple, pear and peach trees, their fruit ripening in the sun. Add to this the scent of vanilla ice cream, then enjoy the herbal aromas of geranium and wild mint growing nearby.

Savour the fruits of the Italian garden as creamy vanilla slips like liquid silk over the tongue as peaches and cream, mandarins and lemons effervesce in the mouth.

Aromatic essences of fennel and nutmeg tantalise with crumbly alomond and coconut that gives way to a nectar that envelops all the fruit, spice and nut flavours in a honeyed caress.

fields.name: Glenmorangie The Original 10 Yr
fields.description:
Imagine yourself in an Italian garden surrounded with mandarin, lemon, apple, pear and peach trees, their fruit ripening in the sun. Add to this the scent of vanilla ice cream, then enjoy the herbal aromas of geranium and wild mint growing nearby.

Savour the fruits of the Italian garden as creamy vanilla slips like liquid silk over the tongue as peaches and cream, mandarins and lemons effervesce in the mouth.

Aromatic essences of fennel and nutmeg tantalise with crumbly alomond and coconut that gives way to a nectar that envelops all the fruit, spice and nut flavours in a honeyed caress.

fields.name: Glenmorangie The Original 10 Yr
fields.description:
Imagine yourself in an Italian garden surrounded with mandarin, lemon, apple, pear and peach trees, their fruit ripening in the sun. Add to this the scent of vanilla ice cream, then enjoy the herbal aromas of geranium and wild mint growing nearby.

Savour the fruits of the Italian garden as creamy vanilla slips like liquid silk over the tongue as peaches and cream, mandarins and lemons effervesce in the mouth.

Aromatic essences of fennel and nutmeg tantalise with crumbly alomond and coconut that gives way to a nectar that envelops all the fruit, spice and nut flavours in a honeyed caress.

fields.name: Glenmorangie Nectar Dor Scotch
fields.description: In hand selected wine barriques from Sauternes, the most famous and ancient sweet wine growing region of France, this whiskey develops its rich, spicy, citrus and dessert-like flavors. It is non chill-filtered for additional aroma and mouthfeel.

fields.name: Glenmorangie Spios
fields.description: The ninth annual release in Glenmorangie's Private Edition series, Spìos—Scots Gaelic for "spice"— is the first Glenmorangie to be fully matured in American ex-rye whiskey casks. Full-bodied and savory, its innovative character was inspired by the bygone elegance of America’s golden whiskey era. This scotch invites rye’s rare notes of cinnamon and clove to shine through in a uniquely smooth single malt whisky.

fields.name: Glenmorangie Allta
fields.description: Specially crafted by Dr. Bill Lumsden, Glenmorangie Allta, Scots Gaelic for ‘Wild,’ is the first Single Malt Scotch Whisky to have ever been fermented using a bespoke strain of yeast: Wild Yeast harvested from their Cadboll barley, which grows in the fields surrounding the distillery. The result: a rounded and crisp single malt whisky defying Scotch convention, proving that yeast can influence taste - to astonishing effect.

fields.name: Glenmorangie Cadboll Estate 15yo
fields.description: Introducing Glenmorangie Cadboll Estate, a limited-edition release exclusively available in North America. A 15YO Single Malt Scotch Whisky crafted from their own Cadboll Estate barley, grown in the fields surrounding their Highland home. Aged in hand-selected, first-fill American White Oak ex-Bourbon casks to create a single-estate whisky of oaky depths and rounded smoothness.

fields.name: Speyburn 10 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: Speyburn 10 years old single malt is matured in a combination of American Oak ex-bourbon and ex-sherry casks. This scotch has bold flavors of toffee, butterscotch, citrus and vanilla with a long, smooth finish.

fields.name: The Bitter Truth Golden Falernum Liqueur
fields.description: The Bitter Truth Golden Falernum Liqueur is rich in flavor. It has a golden taste of vanilla, ginger and almond. A dash of lime is added to create a little spiciness. The nose of the Caribbean drink is similar to the smells you experience during the holiday season.

fields.name: Brokers Gin
fields.description: Made with the finest herbs, spices and fruit imported from the continents, Broker's Gin is specially blended to be dry—not unlike the British sense of humor. This incredibly smooth gin is made in a 200 year-old distillery using a traditional copper pot-still, where a quadruple-distilled  spirit made from English wheat is redistilled with ten traditional botanicals.

fields.name: Fords Gin
fields.description: The nine botanicals found in Fords Gin are sourced from Joseph Flach & Sons Ltd. who have been importing medicinal and culinary botanicals from around the world for London gin houses and tea companies since the days of the British Empire. Steeped in stills for 15 hours to bring out more flavor, Fords Gin is then distilled for five hours before being shipped in bulk to Mendocino County, California, where the gin is cut with local well water. Enjoy in a cocktail like a Martini, Gimlet or Bees Knees.

fields.name: The Glenrothes Sherry Cask Reserve Scotch
fields.description: With a delicious creamy texture that explodes on the palate, this burnished gold single malt delivers soft, spicy and fruity flavors—ginger, orange peel and sherry oak in perfect harmony. Sheer indulgence.

fields.name: The Glenrothes Vintage 1998 Single Malt Scotch
Brugal 1888 Rum
fields.description: Brugal 1888 Rum is an exquisite spirit that pushes the boundaries of wood mastery and leads the way in double aging. First, it spends up to eight years in American oak bourbon casks, followed by a unique second maturation of up to six years in European oak first-fill Spanish sherry casks. To sip 1888 is to taste all the wonder that comes from a true dedication to rum making.

fields.name: Clan Macgregor Scotch
fields.description: A reassuringly high quality yet affordable Scotch whisky, Clan MacGregor is enjoyed in over 30 countries around the world and boasts a flavor profile of dried fruits, toasted nuts and smooth tobacco. The Clan traces its ancestry from Gregor, third son of Alpin, who was the King of Scotland in the late eighth century. Today, Clan MacGregor is one of the US's favorite blended Scotch whiskies and also sells in selected markets in the Middle East and around the world.

fields.name: Clan Macgregor Scotch plastic
fields.description:
A reassuringly high quality yet affordable Scotch whisky, Clan MacGregor is enjoyed in over 30 countries around the world and proudly carries the Clan MacGregor badge and motto, as well as the personal crest of the 24th Clan Chief, Sir Malcolm MacGregor of MacGregor.

The Clan traces its ancestry from Gregor, third son of Alpin, who was the King of Scotland in the late eighth century. This royal lineage gives rise to the Clan motto of Royal is my Race. The Clan MacGregor underwent centuries of persecution and turmoil, their lands confiscated and their very name outlawed. But they were brave and resilient, and eventually all of their rights and privileges were restored.

Today, Clan MacGregor is one of the US's favorite blended Scotch whiskies and also sells in selected markets in the Middle East and around the world.

fields.name: Speyburn Companion Cask
fields.description: Speyburn Companion Cask honors the traditions shared by Speyside and Kentucky. It celebrates the history of using the best casks that were provided by Kentucky’s distillers. The oak and Speyside air helped the whisky develop into what it is today. As a result, there a single casks of creamy, warm whisky with citrus and vanilla notes.

fields.name: Macallan N6 In Lalique
fields.description: Part of the Macallan Decanter Series created to showcase the beautiful range of The Macallan’s natural color, No.6 delivers classic Macallan character in a celebration of richness and spice. A rich and elegant single malt, enticingly dark in color.

fields.name: Murlarkey Cincerity
fields.description: With handcrafted pride, Murlarkey's finest whiskey is gently poured over the highest quality cinnamon sticks and left to naturally infuse in white oak barrels until it reaches perfection. Try it on any occasion as an aperitif, on the rocks, in your favorite whiskey cocktail or chilled and neat. Cincerity, jt's never fake.

fields.name: Kilbeggan Single Grain
fields.description: Kilbeggan Single Grain is made in a single location using malted barley and at least one other grain. The sweet spirit gets its flavor from the casks in which it’s aged. Its taste is similar to sweet biscuits with nice oak tannins drying on the side of the mouth. Enjoy Kilbeggan Single Grain in a delicious cocktail.

fields.name: Bareksten Botanical Gin
fields.description: Bareksten represents the very essence of Norway in both taste and character: dark, wild, breathtaking and dramatic. Barkesten's clean favors, inspired by Norwegian craft traditions, are offer the fresh and clear taste of juniper and classic Norwegian berries and herbs. Perfect served neat on the rocks with an orange slice or topped with a natural tonic

fields.name: Caorunn Small Batch Scottish Gin
fields.description: Carefully handcrafted in the Scottish Highlands, Caorunn expertly infuses five locally foraged gin botanicals. Artisanal and small batch, beautifully mixing the rugged charm of Speyside with the urban sophistication of modern Scotland.

fields.name: Haymans Old Tom Gin
fields.description: Hayman’s Old Tom Gin is a rich and rounded style of gin that was the gin of choice in the 19th Century, made to the family’s original recipe. Relative to London Dry Gin, the Old Tom style imparts a more complex and flavorful taste experience, with a slight sweetness that pleasantly rounds out the botanical base. Old Tom Gin is the essential ingredient in classic cocktails such as the Martinez, Tom Collins and Ramos Gin Fizz.

fields.name: High West OMG Silver Rye
fields.description: OMG had a different meaning in the 1800's - Old MononGahela rye. OMG was considered world class, even earning a shout out in Melville's Moby Dick ("unspeakable old Monongahela") in 1851. OMG's dynasty grew even more after the Civil War destroyed nearly all transportation from Kentucky south. But Prohibition changed all this. The distilleries in Pennsylvania all went out of business and the industry there never recovered to the extent the bourbon distilleries in Kentucky did. Rye whiskey had faded away...until now. High West is proud to be part of bringing back a true American product. They have painstakingly researched the recipe for our OMG Pure Rye, made from 80% rye and 20% malted rye.

fields.name: Highland Park 12 Year Viking Honour
fields.description: VIKING HONOUR reflects the unique culture of Highland Park’s remote island home on Orkney. Part of Scotland yes, but originally belonging to a vast Viking kingdom.
