At Highland Park, they honor the spirit of the Viking ancestors, sharing their pride, integrity and fierce independence, and they distill their whisky to the same exacting standards introduced in 1798 by founder, Magnus Eunson, a descendant of those early Viking settlers.

fields.name: Highland Park Tattoo
fields.description: Tattoos are a vital part of our cultural heritage today. They tell the world who we are, without saying a word. In collaboration with Danish tattoo artist and modern day Viking Soul, Colin Dale, Highland Park created the bold design for this whisky, which celebrates the tattoo as a mark of both standing apart and being part of a tribe – just like Highland Park. Colin’s intricate design is inspired by the free-flowing Nordic knotwork found on Viking wood carvings and reflects the Norse legend of the Midgard serpent, which grew so large it twisted round the Earth to grasp its tail in its mouth

fields.name: Highland Park 25yr Single Malt
fields.description: This 25 year old scotch is matured using a very high proportion of first fill sherry casks, which not only imparts a wonderfully rich, nutty spiciness but also an intensely dark and full bodied flavor profile of dried fruits, caramel, dark chocolate, golden toffee and slightly drier floral smoke. The 25 years spent in oak have not diminished its personality or astonishing depth.

fields.name: Highland Park The Light 17 Year Scotch
fields.description: This special release scotch celebrates spring and summer in Orkney, Scotland. The serpent dragon design on the bottle is inspired by great Norse sagas and embraces both the high sun of the summer solstice and the low sun of the winter solstice. Highland Park Light's flavor profile includes caramelized pear, nutmeg, vanilla, peat, Cedarwood, oak and light smoke.

fields.name: Highland Park Valknut Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: Part of Highland Park's Viking Legend series celebrating their rich Nordic ancestry on Orkney, Valknut's symbol of three interlinked triangles is closely associated with the Norse god, Odin, who guided the spirits of the dead to the underworld and back to the world of the living. Matured in sherry seasoned oak casks, Valknut's smoky, sweet flavor featuers notes of toasted vanilla pods, cracked black pepper, oak shavings, cloves, aniseed and aromatic peat smoke.

fields.name: Highland Park Valkyrie
fields.description: A celebration of Nordic ancestry, Valkyrie features warm aromatic smoke and ripened fruit flavors. Valkyrie was awarded the Chairman's Trophy in the Ultimate Spirits Challenge in 2017.

fields.name: Highland Park Fire Edition
fields.description: Natural in color, the vibrant and intense aromas of ruby red fruits and warm vanilla complement the fiery bitter sweetness of cinnamon bark and the richness of devilishly dark chocolate.

fields.name: Highland Park Full Volume Scotch
fields.description:
Highland Park Full Volume Scotch
was created using 100% ex-bourbon casks. Flavors of creamy vanilla and sweet citrus fruits from the bourbon casks are balanced by Highland Park’s characteristic aromatic smokiness.

fields.name: Highland Park The Dark 17 Year Scotch
fields.description: The Dark celebrates autumn and winter on Orkney: a time to escape from the weather outside and gather with friends and family around the fire. The serpent dragon design on the bottle is inspired by great Norse sagas and embraces both the high sun of the summer solstice and the low sun of the winter solstice. The Dark features flavors of dried fruits, cinnamon, toasted almonds, cedarwood, fruitcake and light smoke.

fields.name: Virginia Highland Whisky Brewers Batch
fields.description: Brewers Batch Virginia-Highland Whisky is made from 100% malted barley, marrying American Single Malt whisky made on-site in Virginia with aged malt whisky from Scotland.  This whisky features finishing casks from local breweries. A true collaboration, the partner brewery uses casks from Virginia Distillery Company to age the beer in, and the distillery takes the casks back for use in finishing Brewers Batch Virginia-Highland Whisky for an additional 8 to 16 months.

fields.name: Isle Of Jura Scotch
fields.description: A touch of peat brings a rich and rounded balance of subtle smoky notes with a sweet sherry cask finish. It boasts flavors of honey, soft pear and licorice and a soft mouthfeel.

fields.name: Foragers Keep Orphan Barrel Single Malt Scotch
fields.description:
Though the Pittyvaich Distillery closed in 1993 after industry restructuring and the building has long since been demolished, this special Orphan Barrel release offers a rare opportunity to enjoy this pleasing single malt. This limited release, 26 year old single malt scotch whisky has lived longer than the distillery from which it came and offers aromas of fruit and freshly cut, crisp red apple. Gentle vanilla creaminess and dense but distant orange peel mellow and warm with a hint of wood spices and a sweet finish.

This product will be distributed via lottery.

fields.name: Old Forester Birthday Bourbon 2019
fields.description:
The 2019 Birthday Bourbon is presented at 105 proof, the highest proof to-date for this special expression. After showing exceptionally unique character during a tasting panel, the 11-year-old barrels were chosen specifically for Birthday Bourbon. A total of 120 barrels distilled on May 15, 2008, and aged on the second floor of Warehouse I, master distillers selected and proofed this year’s limited edition. With a taste consisting of rich oak spice and blackcurrant coupled with light maple, caramel cake and white floral notes, the 2019 Birthday Bourbon is a one-of-a-kind expression with a truly unique multidimensional profile.

This product will be distributed via lottery.

fields.name: Lagavulin Distillers Edition
fields.description: Double matured in Pedro Ximinez cask wood, this is a mellow Lagavulin, peat-rich, sweet and very palatable. This special expression was distilled in 2000 and celebrates the 200th anniversary of the Lagavulin Distillery.

fields.name: Lagavulin Offerman Edition 11yr
fields.description: Eleven year old Lagavulin Single Malt Scotch Whisky created in partnership with Nick Offerman.

fields.name: Lagavulin 25 YR
fields.description: This bicentenary limited edition is magnificently full-on in flavor - a celebration to honor 200 years of Lagavulin Distillery Managers. This extremely limited edition expression has notes of dried fruits and toffee, with a voluptuous oily texture. The finish is long, smooth, honeyed and elegant, and the names of each Distillery Manager are etched on the bottle.

fields.name: Laphroaig Select Scotch
fields.description: Laphroaig has used Oloroso sherry butts, straight American white oak (non-filled with bourbon), PX seasoned hogsheads, Quarter Casks and finally of course first fill Bourbon Casks for this Scotch. This varied cask maturation technique enabled us to create 6 new flavor combinations that were then tested to choose the favorite style and indeed name. The winning flavor and name chosen by you is Laphroaig Select.

fields.name: Laphroaig 25 Year
fields.description: This special whisky is the perfect marriage of oaky flavors from European sherry casks and creamy, sweet flavors from ex-American bourbon barrels. Bottled at cask strength, Laphroaig twenty-five year old is the perfect fusion of these two most different styles of maturation, made even smoother by the twenty-five  years it has had gently maturing. The color is burnished gold, with a nose of initial sherry sweetness followed by an Islay peat tang. On the palate, a burst of peat is restrained by the sherry smoothness that develops into a spicy apple fruitiness. This non-chill-filtered offering won a double gold medal at the 2015 San Francisco World Spirits Competition and received a rating of 95 from the 2015 Ultimate Spirits Challenge.

fields.name: Highclere Castle Gin
fields.description: Downton Abbey fans will agree, the titular castle is as much a character in the show as The Dowager Countess and Lady Mary. Highclere Castle Gin, a super-premium London Dry Gin, is made with botanicals from the castle's gardens, including juniper, lime flower, orange peel, and lavender. Distilled above an ancient underground water source, Highclere Castle Gin is a produced in England’s oldest gin distillery in an antique copper still which dates back to the 1800s.

fields.name: Myers Original Dark Rum
fields.description: Since 1879 the name "Myer's" has been recognized as the world's finest, full-bodied rum. Produced in Jamaica, Myer's rum continues to be distilled in the traditional pot still method and allowed to mature in white oak barrels. It is the final aging period that plays a critical role in determining the distinctive dark color and rich buttery flavor that is synonymous with Myer's.

fields.name: Myers Original Dark Rum
fields.description: Since 1879 the name "Myer's" has been recognized as the world's finest, full-bodied rum. Produced in Jamaica, Myer's rum continues to be distilled in the traditional pot still method and allowed to mature in white oak barrels. It is the final aging period that plays a critical role in determining the distinctive dark color and rich buttery flavor that is synonymous with Myer's.

fields.name: Myers Original Dark Rum
fields.description: Since 1879 the name "Myer's" has been recognized as the world's finest, full-bodied rum. Produced in Jamaica, Myer's rum continues to be distilled in the traditional pot still method and allowed to mature in white oak barrels. It is the final aging period that plays a critical role in determining the distinctive dark color and rich buttery flavor that is synonymous with Myer's.

fields.name: Kirk  Sweeney 23 Yr Dominican Rum
fields.description: Having spent 23 years in the barrel, this rum is as pleasantly complex as the nose and aging would suggest, offering a rich evolution on the mouth–from fresh, sweet sensations to dried fruits.

fields.name: Goslings Black Seal Rum
fields.description:
Black Seal has understandably become synonymous with Bermuda. Black Seal has a rich, intricate flavor, well balanced and nuanced with butterscotch, vanilla and caramel.

 Cocktail Suggestion: Try in a Dark 'n' Stormy!

fields.name: Goslings Black Seal Rum
fields.description:
Black Seal has understandably become synonymous with Bermuda. Black Seal has a rich, intricate flavor, well balanced and nuanced with butterscotch, vanilla and caramel.

 Cocktail Suggestion: Try in a Dark 'n' Stormy!

fields.name: Linkwood 37yr
fields.description: This scotch is a delightfully clean and light Linkwood, both elegant and stylish. It’s the epitome of Speyside ‘finesse’. Displaying typical fresh fruit and floral characters in its slow desire to be approachable, the nose yet gives no hint to the wonderful elegance and complexity evident on the palate and in the finish of this sophisticated malt. Only 6,114 individually numbered bottles exist worldwide.

fields.name: Maraska Slivovitz Plum Brandy
fields.description: Maraska Slivovitz is a pure, natural brandy made by special fermentation and distillations of the finest ripe blue plums grown in the rich soil of the Adriatic Hinterland. The mash is then fermented for three months in 2,000 gallon tanks. It is later distilled for the second time and matured in treated 500 gallon oak casks for at least two years.

fields.name: Bistra Slivovitz Plum Brandy
fields.description: The unique taste of Slivovitz Plum Brandy comes from the plum seeds. When sipped, the brandy's fiery start mellows, leading to a smooth clean finish. Slivovitz is best enjoyed neat, just like a cognac or any other fine brandy, and slightly chilled.

fields.name: Royal Lochnagar Game Of Thrones Baratheon
fields.description: Royal Lochnagar is one of Scotland’s few distilleries with a royal warrant, bestowed by Queen Victoria in 1848. That makes it a perfect match for House Baratheon, the ruling family on the Iron Throne. This Highland whiskey features a stag with a crown around its neck on the label.

fields.name: Talisker Select Reserve Game Of Thrones Greyjoy
fields.description: The Talisker distillery, located on the rugged shores of the Isle of Skye, is the perfect match for the Lords of the Iron Islands. The single malt has a maritime, smoky character and features the House Greyjoy kraken on its label.

fields.name: The Macallan Double Cask 12 Yr
fields.description: Sherry seasoned and matured in a combination of American oak and European oak casks, The Macallan Double Cask 12 Year delivers crisp sweet dry fruits, honey on the nose and a floral citrusy note and flavors of apple blossoms on the finish. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 12 bottles

fields.name: The Macallan Double Cask 12 Yr
fields.description: Sherry seasoned and matured in a combination of American oak and European oak casks, The Macallan Double Cask 12 Year delivers crisp sweet dry fruits, honey on the nose and a floral citrusy note and flavors of apple blossoms on the finish. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 12 bottles

fields.name: The Macallan Double Cask 12 Yr
fields.description: Sherry seasoned and matured in a combination of American oak and European oak casks, The Macallan Double Cask 12 Year delivers crisp sweet dry fruits, honey on the nose and a floral citrusy note and flavors of apple blossoms on the finish. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 12 bottles

fields.name: The Macallan Double Cask 12 Yr
fields.description: Sherry seasoned and matured in a combination of American oak and European oak casks, The Macallan Double Cask 12 Year delivers crisp sweet dry fruits, honey on the nose and a floral citrusy note and flavors of apple blossoms on the finish. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 12 bottles

fields.name: The Macallan Triple Cask 15 Yr
fields.description: The Macallan Triple Cask Matured 15 Years Old forms part of our Triple Cask Matured range; a series of single malt whiskies crafted in a triple cask combination of European and American sherry seasoned oak casks and American ex-bourbon oak casks. An expert marriage of these three distinct cask types, this is a sublime single malt with vibrant orange and chocolate flavors.

fields.name: Macallan Edition No 5
fields.description: The Macallan Edition No.5 pays homage to our diverse range of natural whisky color through a collaboration with the Pantone Color Institute, themselves masters of color.  As casks play the most important role in the maturation of our peerless spirit, only American oak casks were selected for both their natural color and depth of flavor. The result is a wonderfully spicy whisky with a rich and intense aroma.

fields.name: The Macallan Rare Cask
fields.description: The combination of sherry seasoned American and European oak casks deliver an exquisite and unmistakably woody whisky with a rich hue. Rare Cask's rich mahogany-red whisky showcases two of The Macallan’s greatest and most defining strengths—sherry seasoned oak casks and natural color. Soft notes of opulent vanilla and raisin pique the nose, giving way to a sweet ensemble of apple, lemon and orange. Oak resonates on the palate, and vanilla and chocolate lead the finale along with a light citrus zest.

fields.name: The Macallan 18 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description:
From the Highlands of Scotland, The Macallan brings you a smooth, delicate and complex single malt scotch matured in oak casks seasoned with sherry and bourbon.
On the nose you will experience dried fruit with a hint of citrus, vanilla and cinnamon. The taste is of  dried fruit with spice, clove, orange and wood smoke, and the finish full and lingering with sweet toffee and ginger. Enjoy straight, with a splash of water or with ice.

fields.name: The Macallan Fine Oak 17yr
fields.description: The Macallan Fine Oak 17 Year is matured for a minimum of seventeen years in three exceptional oak cask types. This complex combination of casks delivers a flavor profile of exotic notes including tropical fruits, jasmine and citrus. The palate is soft and rich with a hint of citrus, spice and wood smoke before giving way to lingering finish with a hint of orange zest.

fields.name: The Macallan Fine Oak 10yr
fields.description: This 10 year old expression is the result of a unique combination of both bourbon and sherry oak casks. The result is a beautifully crip and clean Macallan with hints of cereal and bakery flavors and smooth undertones of marmalade.

fields.name: Macallan V5 Reflexion
fields.description:
The Macallan Reflexion is matured
solely in first-fill, sherry-seasoned hogshead casks that give this scotch its intricate character and a richer, more concentrated flavor profile. Orange and citrus fruits
dominate the nose. The palate starts with light citrus zest and new oak, giving way to the juicy sweetness of lemon and orange. Reflexion has a medium and soft finish.

fields.name: The Macallan Classic Cut
fields.description: Offering a special take on The Macallan, this whisky offers an indulgent character with a satisfyingly long finish. Matured exclusively in hand-picked sherry seasoned American and European oak casks from Jerez, Spain and then bottled to perfectly unlock its unique flavor profile, this limited release offers a special and memorable take on The Macallan. With its combination of flavors of caramel, orange zest and nutmeg spice and a satisfyingly long finish, the result is an indulgent single malt whisky with a sweet and spicy character.

fields.name: The Macallan Double Cask Gold Scotch
fields.description: The Macallan Double Cask Gold combines the classic Macallan style with the unmistakable sweetness of American oak. Light citrus notes and boiled sweets dominate the palate before giving way to cinnamon, ginger and toasted apples.

fields.name: The Macallan 25 Year Sherry Oak Scotch
fields.description: This rich mahogany scotch has an aroma of citrus, cinnamon, sherry and wood smoke. The palate is best described as full with rich dried fruits and wood smoke. The finish is long with dried fruits, wood smoke and spice.

fields.name: Macallan Estate
fields.description: The Macallan Estate is their Whisky Maker’s tribute to their heritage and home. Containing rare spirit distilled from their precious estate-grown barley, The Macallan Estate delivers a subtle hint of citrus. This balances the traditional sherried richness, resulting in a complex single malt with an extraordinarily long finish.

fields.name: The Macallan m
fields.description: M is the iconic result of a collaboration between three masters of their crafts. Drawing on some of the richest and rarest casks maturing at the distillery, this is a complex and intense whisky. With a rich rosewood color derived from the sherry seasoned Spanish oak casks that have nurtured this special whisky through its maturation process, M delivers a complexity and sumptuous intensity.

fields.name: The Macallan Edition No 4
fields.description: Aged in a combination of European and American oak casks, Edition No.4 presents a zesty, vibrant and invigorating single malt with flavors of rounded honey, sweet toffee and citrus fruits. The nose features notes of honey, sweet apple, orange zest, ginger, nutmeg and oak. On the palate, there is nutmeg with wood spices and green cloves before a sweet and vanilla viscous mouth coating. The finish is fruity, long and lasting.

fields.name: The Macallan 30 Year Sherry Oak Scotch
fields.description: The Macallan Sherry Oak expressions are characterized by rich color and notes of dried fruit and spice, a result of being exclusively aged in 100% Sherry-seasoned oak casks. The pinnacle offering of the Sherry Oak range, The Macallan 30 Years Old follows the same faithful and tempered distillery process that distinguishes The Macallan from the rest. During the aging process, The Macallan Whisky Maker and his team keep a watchful eye on the casks to select the precise moment when each is at the peak of maturity. Through careful selection between almost 200 different casks, a composite is produced and passed to The Macallan nosing panel for final approval. With its rich mahogany color and deliciously smooth full-bodied flavor, The Macallan Sherry Oak 30 Years Old is the result of Macallan’s unwavering commitment to quality, patience and the pursuit of perfection.

fields.name: Virginia Lightning Peach
fields.description: Summer down South means fresh, juicy peaches, warm peach cobbler and sipping ice cold peach tea on the porch. Belmont Farms made things even better by bottling up those summer memories in their Virginia Lightning Peach Moonshine. Grab a rocking chair and your favorite sweet tea and experience the magic when you add peach moonshine.

fields.name: Oban
fields.description: Rich smoky flavors with hints of oak in the finish. Flavors of salty sea spray and cut hay define the complexity of this thick, full scotch.

fields.name: Oban Little Bay
fields.description: Little Bay’s warming richness is neatly balanced by a smoky spicy-dryness.

fields.name: Oban Distillers Edition
fields.description: Importers and entrepreneurs, the founders of Oban distillery would have approved of the Spanish influence brought to bear with this edition’s second maturation Montilla Fino cask wood finish.

fields.name: Old Pulteney
fields.description: Traditionally crafted using techniques that other distillers have long abandoned, this winner of numerous gold medals at the most prestigious international competitions is a high water-mark of quality spirits.

fields.name: Talisker Storm
fields.description: A welcome addition to the Talisker range, Talisker Storm is probably the smokiest whisky to be produced on the Isle of Skye. On the nose you can detect banana, sticking plasters, citrus and white pepper. The palate is thick and coats the mouth with wood smoke, brine, tin and chili heat.

fields.name: Speyburn 15 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: After maturing in American and Spanish oak casks, Speyburn 15 Year Single Malt Scotch has vibrant and rich flavors. There are notes of orange, toffee, vanilla combined with a light touch of spice.

fields.name: Mcclellands Speyside Single Malt
fields.description: Speyside malts are sweet and fruity; sometimes delicate, sometimes rich and robust. This is a golden honeyed scotch with a fresh minty, pine aroma. The palate has an initial fibrous sweet nougat essence and is complemented by the savory flavors of Brazil.

fields.name: Johnnie Walker Green Scotch
fields.description: Crafted from a palette of Speyside, Highland, Lowland and Island malts and matured for at least 15 years, Johnnie Walker Green delivers all the character of a single malt whisky, but with a greater depth of flavor. Johnnie Walker Green Label is a truly unique blend to savor while you sit back and unwind.

fields.name: Chivas Regal 18 Year Scotch
fields.description: Chivas 18 is meticulously blended to achieve its smoky, indulgent flavor profile of dried fruits, buttery toffee and dark chocolate. It's a uniquely rich and multi-layered whisky which is produced using various malt and grain whiskies from distilleries all over Scotland, including classic Speyside malt from Strathisla. Much more than a drink, Chivas 18 is a luxuriously complex experience waiting to be discovered.

fields.name: Pig Nose Scotch
fields.description:
Refreshingly soft, yet reassuringly rich... the whisky's name plays on the notion that it's as smooth as a pig's nose. This exceptional blended Scotch has been created by Richard Paterson, Scotland's only third generation Master Blender. Produced in specially selected first fill oak casks, the seriously satisfying smoothness is achieved through combining oak-aged Speyside, Islay and Lowland malts with superior Invergordon gentle grain whiskies.

Like Sheep Dip, Pig's Nose is another award-winner. Launched in 1977, as a stablemate for Sheep Dip, Pig's Nose is sold and enjoyed throughout the world, but particularly in the UK, USA, Canada, New Zealand, Denmark and France.

fields.name: Mcclellands Highland Scotch
fields.description: Highland malts capture the true spirit of Scotland; the moorlands, it has an aroma of heather, fresh pine forests and vanilla. The palate is rounded, firm, and fruity with a medium body and smooth lengthy finish.

fields.name: Mcclellands Highland Scotch
fields.description: Highland malts capture the true spirit of Scotland; the moorlands, it has an aroma of heather, fresh pine forests and vanilla. The palate is rounded, firm, and fruity with a medium body and smooth lengthy finish.

fields.name: Johnnie Walker Gold Reserve Scotch
fields.description: Johnnie Walker Gold Label Reserve is the perfect blend for an indulgent celebration. Luxurious, creamy and honeyed, it is a wonderful tribute to the harmonious partnership of Speyside and Highland whiskies, with just a hint of smoldering embers from the West Coast. Enjoy Johnnie Walker Gold Label Reserve on its own, with a dash of water or along with your favorite mixer.

fields.name: Springbank 21 Year Single Malt Scotch
fields.description: Originating from its home in Campbeltown, this warm and creamy whisky that will take you on a journey. This 21 year scotch has intense aromas of toffee and cereal with notes of fresh strawberries and watermelon. The robust palate contains a creamy oiliness that only enhances its already creamy finish.

fields.name: Chivas 21 Year Royal Salute Scotch
fields.description: Chivas 21 Year Royal Salute is an exceptional blend of very rare whiskies. It has a rich golden color with a balance of fruit, floral and smoky fragrances. Deep, sweet, nutty, smooth and full-bodied flavors reveal themselves; developing into a long, warm and satisfying finish.

fields.name: Talisker Single Malt
fields.description: A wonderful award-winning Island malt, bottled at above-average strength with a comforting smooth afterglow.  This scotch opens with a peat-smoke aroma with seawater saltiness, the liquor of fresh oysters, a citrus sweetness. It boasts a rich dried-fruit sweetness with clouds of smoke and strong barley-malt flavors, warming and intense. At the back of the mouth is an explosion of pepper and kippers. Huge, long, volcanic finish with an appetizing sweetness.

fields.name: Talisker 25 YR
fields.description: This beautifully orchestrated, delicious, appetizingly dry, and fully mature variation of Talisker has a lingering finish which cannot outstay its welcome.

fields.name: Talisker 30yr
fields.description: This mild-mannered, more mature Talisker is elegant and lightly scented but has plenty of personality and unmistakable character.

fields.name: Caffe Borghetti Espresso Liqueur
fields.description: Caffè Borghetti is the liqueur of Italian expresso coffee, based on Ugo Borghetti's recipe from 1860 to celebrate the inauguration of the new railway line Pescara-Ancona. A special mixture of Arabica and Robusta coffee, Caffe Borghetti has a rich and intense aroma.

fields.name: Joseph Magnus Bourbon
fields.description: Joseph Magnus bourbon is a marriage of straight bourbon whiskey aged in white oak and finished in Oloroso sherry, Pedro Ximénez sherry, and cognac casks for a unique flavor profile that's layered in apricot, roasted nuts, caramel and vanilla.

fields.name: Widow Jane Straight Bourbon Whiskey 10 Year
fields.description: Widow Jane Whiskey is a true New York City whiskey, evocative both of one of mankind's greatest achievements — New York City's skyline — and Brooklyn's artisanal, craft spirits movement. This bold, complex aromas of spiced fruit, vanilla, cinnamon and caramel merge with notes of citrus, toffee and earthy minerals.

fields.name: Rabbit Hole Dareringer Px Sherry Cask
fields.description: Rabbit Hole's Sherry Cask Finished Bourbon epitomizes Kaveh’s wife, Heather.  Elegant, sweet and charming, she is the muse behind the brand.  A Louisville native and bourbon enthusiast, she lured Kaveh away from his beloved Scotch and down a rabbit hole he may have never dared alone.

fields.name: Angels Envy Port Barrel Bourbon
fields.description:
There's bourbon and then there's divine inspiration painstakingly crafted into a spirit so sublime you'll want to share it with the world. Angel's Envy is the second one. It's a total return to the art of craft-first, hand blended batches of 8 to 12 barrels at a time and every one of the whiskeys is finished in hand-selected finishing barrels. For an added layer of flavor and complexity the bourbon and special cask strength are finished in ruby port casks and the rye is finished in rum barrels.

Shop additional bourbons.

fields.name: Angels Envy Cask Strength Bourbon
fields.description:
A complex and unfiltered spirit, enjoy it neat or with just a splash of water to release the flavor nuances. On the nose there are notes of banana, honey and light burnt wood before leading to flavors of caramel, sweet raisins, cola and herbs. The finish is reminiscent of dark chocolate, heavy toasted oak and fresh figs.

Shop additional bourbons.

fields.name: Tomatin 18 Year Scotch
fields.description: After spending eighteen years in refill oak, this Tomatin is married in Oloroso sherry casks to round it out and add a layer of sweet dried fruit flavors. The result is a Scotch with honey and soft oak flavors that develop into a hint of dark chocolate with a citrus bite, giving it a sustained sweet and slightly dry finish.

fields.name: Rhum Barbancourt 5 Star Reserve Speciale
fields.description:
Barbancourt 5 Star Rhum 8Yr

Rhum Barbancourt is a distinctively unique rum, pot-stilled from fresh sugar cane juice and aged in oak casks in a method similar to the finest cognacs. A true sipping rum of unsurpassed quality

fields.name: Rhum Barbancourt 3 Star
fields.description: Produced from pure sugar cane juice (Agricole) sourced from local Haitian farmers. Twice distilled like fine cognac, then aged in French limousin oak barrels for a full four years. Round bodied and very smooth, but intense without the exaggeration of flavors.

fields.name: Kablam Un aged Corn Whiskey
fields.description: Kablam has a robust “corn” nose, and is an unaged corn whiskey, not moonshine. Moonshine often has a horrible bite. Very smooth, its strong corn flavor lends itself well as a substitute for vodka in a Bloody Mary.

fields.name: Buchanan Red Seal
fields.description: Buchanan's Red Seal is inspired by the blend crafted by James Buchanan & Co. over 100 years ago. Matured to perfection, this award-winning whisky is perfect on its own. Simply serve neat or on the rocks with a glass of iced water on the side.

fields.name: Martell Cordon Bleu
fields.description: Martell Cordon Bleu is the cognac for true connoisseurs and has acquired legendary status since its creation by Edouard Martell in 1912. Its distinctive taste, characterized by an explosion of deliciously fruited, spice notes.

fields.name: Twin Creeks 1st Sugar Moonshine
fields.description: 1st Sugar often leads people to a thought of "sweetness" but this clear moonshine is far from that. Following a run of pure rye whiskey, the spent mash is "sugared" back and run again. This is what is called 1st shots or 1st sugar in the hills of Franklin County, Virginia. The finish is a stout but smooth drinking liquor that pairs well with anything.

fields.name: Twin Creeks Rye
fields.description: You ever wonder why most whiskey is brown? It’s because it’s aged in oak or, more commonly these days, soaked with char to mellow it out and add color and flavor. But, if you’re making good whiskey, why add flavor or color? Sweet Mash Rye doesn’t need any artificial coloring or flavoring—any more than Brie cheese needs to be dyed green.

fields.name: Twin Creeks Peach Brandy
fields.description: The first batch of brandy produced at Twin Creeks Distillery in Franklin County, Va. This is a product of hard work and effort. Shirley's Orchard resides along Philpott Lake, growing the most flavorful peaches around. The orchard sits five minutes away from the distillery. After picking time, the peaches are mixed and mashed until fermentation is complete. The end product is a smooth and clear brandy that will leave you wanting more.

fields.name: Jeffersons Reserve Twin Oak Custom Barrel
Fcd Roanoke Rum
fields.description: Created using the highest quality of unrefined sugar, it's not a white rum or a dark rum but gold rum. FCD Heritage Spirits are small batch distilled in a pot still. FCD’s line of spirits are perfect for sipping by themselves, enjoying on the rocks and pair beautifully with any number of traditional drink recipes and juices.

fields.name: Smirnoff Vodka plastic
fields.description: Smirnoff vodka undergoes three distillations for purity and ten filtration stages. The end result—an exceptionally crisp and clean flavor. This vodka is a regular award-winner and a favorite both in the US and around the globe.

fields.name: Haig Club Scotch
fields.description: Haig Club is made at Cameronbridge distillery in Scotland. This liquid has been crafted using a unique process that combines grain whiskey from three cask types. This creates a fresh, clean style that showcases butterscotch and toffee for an ultra-smooth taste.

fields.name: Kilbeggan Irish Whiskey
fields.description: Kilbeggan is a unique Irish whiskey. Like most Irish people, Kilbeggan is easy going and approachable, but with its own distinctive style. The finest grain and malt whiskeys are blended together for a smooth, sweet taste and lovely malt finish, a characteristic of their pot still that is over 180 year old and still at the heart of Kilbeggan Irish whiskey.

fields.name: Pussers British Navy Rum
fields.description: Pusser's is the original navy rum as served on warships of Great Britain's Royal Navy from about 1655 to 1970. Pusser's 350 years of liquid history has become the standard by which other dark rums are measured. Pusser's was never sold or offered to the public until 1979. Prior to this, if a rum connoisseur managed to obtain a tot or two, it was valued for a very special occasion. Pusser's full, rich flavor is all natural, no flavoring agents are added. It is the only rum whose flavor is sufficiently distinctive to be savored through the ingredients of just about any cocktail.

fields.name: Goslings Ginger Beer 6 Pack cans
fields.description: Ginger Beer was originally produced in the 1700s, brought to North America by the British colonists where it was brewed locally in homes and taverns. After the American civil war, it was commercially produced and transported to new markets, mostly in western New York State, where breweries cropped up along the Erie Canal. In the US, production was abruptly halted by Prohibition.

fields.name: Malfy Con Arancia Blood Orange Gin
fields.description: Malfy Con Arancia is distilled using the peel of Sicilian blood oranges, Italian juniper and four other botanicals. Blood oranges are harvested in November, their rich red color developing during cool Mediterranean nights.

fields.name: Don Q Gold Rum
fields.description: A classic Puerto Rican rum, this golden spirit is a blend of rums aged 1 1/2 to 5 years then distilled through a carbon filtration process for optimal flavor. Easy to drink, mix Don Q Gold Rum with juices, soda water or tonics for a refreshing adult beverage.

fields.name: Don Q Gold Rum
fields.description: A classic Puerto Rican rum, this golden spirit is a blend of rums aged 1 1/2 to 5 years then distilled through a carbon filtration process for optimal flavor. Easy to drink, mix Don Q Gold Rum with juices, soda water or tonics for a refreshing adult beverage.

fields.name: Benedictine  Brandy DOM
fields.description: B&B by Bénédictine is one of the oldest premixed cocktails. In the 1930s, during Prohibition, a barman at Club 21 in Manhattan came up with the idea of mixing brandy with Bénédictine. In 1937, Le Palais Bénédictine decided to produce this by blending 60% Bénédictine with 40% fine French Brandy, allowing the flavors to rest and harmonize in small, vintage French oak barrels that have previously been used to age only the finest cognacs.  With a light herbal and spicy fragrance, laced with the aromas of dried fruits, B&B offers a dry palate and a mild finish of honey. It can be enjoyed neat or over ice in a snifter. Also try it mixed with coffee or espresso, pairing it after dinner with dark chocolate.

fields.name: Johnnie Walker Blue   Year Of The Rat
fields.description: Celebrate the 2020 Chinese New Year and the first of all zodiac animals, the Rat, with a limited edition design bottle of Johnnie Walker Blue Label Blended Scotch Whisky Limited Edition Year of the Rat. This colorful limited edition design bottle pays homage to the pioneering spirit that has made the Lunar New Year a dynamic global event. The palate features a velvety combination of vanilla, honey and rose petals before broadening out to include a zesty orange flavor with notes of hazelnut, sherry and dark chocolate. Serve neat for an elegantly simple drink.

fields.name: Double Eagle Very Rare
fields.description: This very limited 20-year-old bourbon is matured twice as long as Eagle Rare 10-year-old bourbon and features two beautifully-sculpted crystal glass eagles in the Double Eagle decanter. A true collectors’ item, Double Eagle Very Rare is presented in a luxurious silver box and crystal decanter. Very few bottles were produced, with an individually-numbered letter of authenticity included with each. Even after two decades of aging in an oak barrel, this bourbon is surprisingly balanced. Hints of vanilla, toasted oak and caramel lead to a gracefully-aged oaky flavor.

fields.name: Ron Barcelo Imperial
fields.description: Ron Barcelo Imperial is a  blend of rums, aged in American bourbon oak barrels, ranging in age up to 10 years. A full-bodied rum with hints of toffee, roasted nut, spice and vanilla. A super-premium sipping rum that is ideal for consuming straight or on-the-rocks. Ron Barceló is uniquely different from other Dominican rums because it’s made from the fermented juice of sugarcane and not from molasses. The result is a smoother, more well-rounded taste. Additionally, the sugarcane grown in the Dominican Republic that is the source for Ron Barceló comes from fields owned by Barceló & Co.

fields.name: Paradis Imperial
fields.description: Inspired by the legend of an 1818 order of a unique blend of rare cognacs for Tsar Alexander I of Russia, Hennessy's Master Blender Yann Fillioux created Paradis Impérial in 2011.  Comprised of eaux-de-vie aged between 30 and 130 years old, one must enjoy Paradis Impérial slowly, in order to fully appreciate the finesse of every single drop.

fields.name: Torres 10 Gran Reserva Imperial
fields.description:
The #1 Spanish brandy worldwide. With the passing of time, the elegant, round overtones of oak are fused, in close harmony with the strong spirituous aroma of venerable distillates that give character to Torres 10.
Dark topaz-colored, with fine old gold tints. Of strong aroma, it displays an intense bouquet with warm hints of spices (cinnamon, vanilla). On the palate it is round and rich in tannins, developing toward a lush and lingering aftertaste, in which the aromatic overtones of the oak are revealed.

fields.name: Kessler Whiskey
fields.description: Kessler is an American blended whiskey known for its smoothness since 1888! The brand's heritage is rooted in the legendary Old West, where Julius Kessler himself traveled from saloon to saloon personally selling his fine whiskey.

fields.name: Rich  Rare Reserve Canadian
fields.description: Rich taste and rare smoothness are what you'll find in one of Canada's oldest whisky brands.

fields.name: Imperia Vodka
fields.description: Produced by an advanced distillation process and layer-filtered through quartz crystal from the Ural Mountains, Imperial Royal Vodka is allowed to rest in relaxation tanks for 72 hours before bottling. The result is an exceptionally pure and clean taste with a light herbal aroma and elegant, full body.

fields.name: Horton Vineyards Vintage Port
fields.description: Horton was the first to make a commercially available port in Virginia since prohibition with its 1995 Vintage Port. This Vintage Port is a blend of  70% Touriga Nacional, 30% Tinta Cao.  Big, full bodied, sweet, with refined texture and aromas of blackberry and cherry perfumes.

fields.name: Domaine Grasse Et Fils VSOP
fields.description: Domaine Grasse Et Fils VSOP is a blend of varieties typical of the Armagnac region. This VSOP is aged for at least seven or eight years in oak casks. Its powerful nose contains aromas of warm bread with a hint of toast and gingerbread. When exposed to air, aromas of a baker’s oven, rancio and candied fruit appear. The mouth is smooth and round with no sensation of alcohol but woody vanilla. A perfectly balanced, very mature Armagnac which astonishes with its perfect harmony of wood and alcohol.

fields.name: St Germain Liqueur
fields.description: St. Germain is the first liqueur in the world created in the artisanal French manner from freshly handpicked elderflower blossoms. It has a light, refreshing sweetness with taste notes of pear, citrus and tropical fruits. Extremely versatile, St. Germain adds character to many cocktails and mixes well with all base spirits in addition to wine and champagne. The signature St. Germain Cocktail, made with St.Germain, sparkling wine, club soda and a lemon twist, is a simple yet sophisticated cocktail for any occasion. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 12 bottles

fields.name: St Germain Liqueur
fields.description: St. Germain is the first liqueur in the world created in the artisanal French manner from freshly handpicked elderflower blossoms. It has a light, refreshing sweetness with taste notes of pear, citrus and tropical fruits. Extremely versatile, St. Germain adds character to many cocktails and mixes well with all base spirits in addition to wine and champagne. The signature St. Germain Cocktail, made with St.Germain, sparkling wine, club soda and a lemon twist, is a simple yet sophisticated cocktail for any occasion. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 12 bottles

fields.name: St Germain Liqueur
fields.description: St. Germain is the first liqueur in the world created in the artisanal French manner from freshly handpicked elderflower blossoms. It has a light, refreshing sweetness with taste notes of pear, citrus and tropical fruits. Extremely versatile, St. Germain adds character to many cocktails and mixes well with all base spirits in addition to wine and champagne. The signature St. Germain Cocktail, made with St.Germain, sparkling wine, club soda and a lemon twist, is a simple yet sophisticated cocktail for any occasion. Want more than one? Shelf pack size (50 ml): 12 bottles

fields.name: St George Spirits All Purpose Vodka
fields.description: Bartlett pears (yes, pears) are the secret to this vodka. To make All Purpose Vodka, St. George distills their flagship pear brandy and blends the resulting distillate with a non-GMO base spirit. While there is no overt pear flavor, this vodka has substantial body and subtle floral notes. Try in Vodka Martini, Vodka Tonic, Moscow Mule or any sweet or savory creation you can imagine.

fields.name: St George Spirits Terroir Gin
fields.description: Forest-driven and earthy, Terroir is an aromatic gin with woodsy notes of Douglas fir, California bay laurel, coastal sage and a hint of citrus. Enjoy on the rocks or in a martini. The Douglas fir in this gin sometimes triggers an association with winter time but Terroir is also a gin for all seasons. In summer, try Terroir with fresh huckleberries, blueberries or raspberries for an earthy, brambly delight

fields.name: Blantons Single Barrel Bourbon
fields.description:
Introduced in 1984, Blanton’s namesake bourbon was the first ever single-barrel bourbon sold commercially. Blanton’s Single Barrel Bourbon has a deep, satisfying nose of nutmeg and spices. Powerful dry vanilla notes in harmony with hints of honey amid strong caramel and corn. A medium finish composed of returning corn and nutmeg flavors.

Shop additional bourbons.

fields.name: Blantons Single Barrel Bourbon
fields.description:
Introduced in 1984, Blanton’s namesake bourbon was the first ever single-barrel bourbon sold commercially. Blanton’s Single Barrel Bourbon has a deep, satisfying nose of nutmeg and spices. Powerful dry vanilla notes in harmony with hints of honey amid strong caramel and corn. A medium finish composed of returning corn and nutmeg flavors.

Shop additional bourbons.

fields.name: Writers Tears Copper Pot Irish Whiskey
fields.description: This light, sweet Irish whiskey is made using a mix of single pot still and a single malt whiskey, resulting in honey and fruity notes. This Irish whiskey triple distilled, non -pleated and matured and aged in American Oak bourbon casks. It is gently spiced with a burst of ginger, butterscotch, and background notes of toasted oak. The result is a long, elegant finish with subtle notes of milk chocolate and almonds.
